25b7(mdo): 'brul dka' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni mdog gcig ste kar ro// tshangs ris ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa 'dun
26a1(mdo): 'dod pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad myed do rnams dang / 'od gsal pa rnamapa dang / dge' chung ba rnams dang / tshad myed/ 
26a2(mdo): dge' ba rnams dang / dge' rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin myed pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams
26a3(mdo): dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba po rnams dang / 'og byin gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
26a4(mdo): mi yang byed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes byed byin gyi skye mched rnams la ni kha dog byed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu dkrid kyi byi dpas kyi khang pa ched du byab pa dang / ched du ma
26a5(mdo): byas pa ma yin pa dang / gzhal myed kha dra ba dang / sa kha/ de rnams yod pa bzhin du/ sher kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ban yang spyod rnams kyang de bzhin no// 
26a6(mdo): byang gi sgra phyi snyad kyi gyi rnams kyi khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma me na las khang dag ko// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhas spyod khabade ched du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa dag go// 
26a7(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ji lta bu bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
26a8(mdo): byed pa rnams kyi sang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal byed khang rnams ni ched du byas pa dag go// changs rim pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og phyin pa rnams kyi bar gyi
26b1(mdo): gzhal byedakhang rnams kyang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs myed pa rnams la di khang pa dag byed do// ji ltar 'jam bu kringad kyi phyi rnams la ki dang ba dang 'gro ba 'di sa ste/ bas gos
26b2(mdo): dang / sha na'i ras dang / gso' ras dang / zar ma 'i ras dang / ras gos dang / zab dang dang / ko ta ma pa'i ras dang / rtso du ku la'o ko sa dang / a pa ran to'i ka'o gas dang / ras dang / khe'u ras
26b3(mdo): yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ban yang spyod rnams la yang yod do// byad kyi sgra myi stan gyi myi rnams ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gas drag kon no// 
26b4(mdo): ji ltar byad kyi sgra byi snyan gyi myi rnams dpag bsams shing las/ byung ba'i gos dag gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi sa kyi lha rnams dang / sum brgyartsa gsum pa rnams dang
26b5(mdo): 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnaMs kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni gyos
26b6(mdo): gyon pa bzhin du skye'o// tsharas ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og byin gyi bar dag kyang gos gyon pa bzhin du skye'o// byang ki sgra byi snyan gyi myi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi
26b7(mdo): gos kyi shing ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// gzhag kyos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
26b8(mdo): rnams te/ dpag pa sems kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dag gos sems skyed ma thag du de la yal ka 'dung bar byed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha
27a1(mdo): rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa
27a2(mdo): bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang rnams te/ dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta du 'dod pa de lta bu lha 'am/ lA'i bu po dag gis sems skyed pa
27a3(mdo): zag tu yal ka 'dud par byed de/ de'i lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'o lha rnabs kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi wa
27a4(mdo): rnams la ni/ dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos byed do// de yan chad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling kyi myi rnams la gtid pa dang / bko' ba lci ba dang / yang ba yod pa
27a5(mdo): bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi pha/ na lang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byad kyi sgra myi snyan gyi myi rnams kyi dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos la ni
27a6(mdo): srang gcig yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni srang phyed yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum kyi lha rnams kyi ni srang bzhi cha gcig go// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni srang ki brgyad ca gcig/ 
27a7(mdo): dga' ldan pa rda mA kyi ni srang bcu drug gyi cha gcig go// 'phrul dka' rnams kyi ni srang gi sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi cha gcig ko// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i kos
27a8(mdo): ni srang drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ni gzhal du myed pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta bu bzhin du/ 'og phyin byi bar gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal du/ 
27b1(mdo): myed pa'i kos yin no// nyi zer gyi rdul kyi bzhi bcu tsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul pra rab yin no// rdul 'phra rab bdun la ni glang rdul pra sro ga ni ga ko// rdul 'apra mo bar+yan la ni ho zer rtul gcig/ 
27b2(mdo): ko// nyi zer gyi rdul bra d+yAn la ni ri bong rdul gcig go// ri bong rdul bdud la ni lug rdul gcig ko// lug rdul ba dUn la ni klang rdul gcig go// glang rdul ba dUn la ni sro ma gcig ko// sro mi
27b3(mdo): bdun la ni a ka na gcig go// a ka na bdun pa ni ba ti ka ka cig go// ba ti ka bdun pa ni nas 'bru kacig ko// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig ko// sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni lar+tha/ 
27b4(mdo): kar ngo // 'jam bu glo kyi myi kha cig ni khru chad de ltar bcis/ pa'i khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o// shar kyi lus 'phags nas/ ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kye ban lang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu
27b5(mdo): drug pa'o// byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams ni khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyar brags kyi bzhi cha gcig go// su ma bcu rtsa gsum pa
27b6(mdo): rnams kyi ni rgyang grag sa phyed do// 'thab bral ba rnams ni rkyang grags kyi bzhi cha gsum po// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ri rkyang grags gcig pa'o// 'phrul dga' rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang rgyang grag+sa/ 
27b7(mdo): kyi bzhi cha gcig go// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rkyang grags byed dang gnyis so// tshangs ris pa rnams ni dpag tshad phyed do// tshangs pa 'dun na 'don pa rnams ni dpag tshad gcig ni/ 
27b8(mdo): tshangs pa chen po rnams ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis so// 'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag chad gnyis so// tshad myed 'od pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o// 'od gsal pa rnams kyi na dpag chad
28a1(mdo): brgyad do// dge' chung pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go// tshad myed dge' ba dmas kyi ni dpag chad sum bcu ha gnyis so// dge' rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag chad drug
28a2(mdo): bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// sprin byed pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag chad nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i rnams kyi ni dpag cad lnga
28a3(mdo): brgya'o// 'du shes byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// myi che ba'i lha'i lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad stong ngo // byaM gdung ba rnams kyi ni dpag chad nyis stong ngo // 
28a4(mdo): bya nopa snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin tu mthong ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // 'og myin/ ki lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo/ 
28a5(mdo): gzugs myed pa rnams la ni bsags pa'i lus myed do// nyi zer rdul gri bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul 'phra mo bad+yAn/ 
28a6(mdo): la ni ti zer gyi rdul gcig go// rgyas par 'khru kang gi bar du ste/ 'jab pu kling ki myi kha cig ni gos 'khru brgyad pa kon no// kha cig ni 'khru bcu bkon no// shar kyi khrus 'phags pa nas kyin
28a7(mdo): khru nyi shu pa'o// nub kyi ban klang spyod pa rnams kyis ni khru bzhi bcu'o// byang bye sgra myi snyan kyi byi rnams mi dpag bsapas shing las phung po'i kos khru bicu pa gon no// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha nas kyang
28a8(mdo): lus la ci ngan pa'i gos khyod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lharnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'og byin gyi bar dag kyi yang de bzhin no// 'jam bu glid kyi myin pas dbang po tha dad ste/ kha cig la ni po la dang pa
28b1(mdo): po dang / kha cig la ni po'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum/ 
28b2(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnapas dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni/ mo la/ 
28b3(mdo): dbang po yang byed/ po'i dbang po yang byed/ rangs ris pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myi gyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jab shu kling gi phyi dmas la bka ma gtong ba dang / bag pa len pa
28b4(mdo): yod pa bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags pa dpas dang / nub kyi ban thang spyod pa rnapas la yang yod do// byad kyi swa byi skud kyi phyid pas la ni byed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / 
28b5(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / sha bral ba rnas dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan/ 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi
28b6(mdo): rnams la bag pa gtong ba yang byed bag ma len pa yang myed do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du 'og myin gyi bar kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshogs bzhi pa'o// sdom
28b7(mdo): ni/ grang dang / dus tshogs pa tshan mo dang / pa pa dang ni rje khol dang / nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhen/ bcu chen yongs su brjod pa yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams shin tu grang ba dang / shin tu
28b8(mdo): tsha ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / rub kyi ban yang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang kyi sgra myi snyan pa rnams la ni myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la
29a1(mdo): yang byed do// de yan chad la yang myed do// ji ltar 'jam bu glid kyi phyi nabs la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang / dpyid dang / dbyar yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dpapa dang / 
29a2(mdo): nub kyi ban yang spyod pa rnams dang / byad kyi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
29a3(mdo): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la dus tshigs myed de/ 'og myin gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam bu gling gi phyi rnams la
29a4(mdo): mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags po/ nams dang / nub kyi ban yang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi dasgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha dpas dang / sum
29a5(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris
29a6(mdo): kyi lha rnams la/ mtshan mo yang myed/ nyin mo yang byed do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bang gi la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu glid kyi myi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhin du/ 
29a7(mdo): shar kyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang kyi sgra myi snyad pa'i myi rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba nas
29a8(mdo): dang / dka' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni pha yang myed ma yang byed/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
29b1(mdo): ji lta pa bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam bu krid kyi phyi rnams la jo 'o dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ban yang spyod pa rnams la/ 
29b2(mdo): yang yod do// byang kyi sgra myi snyan pa'i phyi rnams la ni rdo'o yang byed bran yang myed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni rdo bo dang bran yang yod do// rgyal cher bzhi pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin/ 
29b3(mdo): du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs
29b4(mdo): ris kyi lha rnams la ni jo bo yang myed bran yang byed do// tshangs ris pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og phyed kyi bar dag/ la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam bu sring kyi myi rnams la nor
29b5(mdo): dang 'bra yod pa bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gyi spa myi snyan gyi myi rnams lo ne 'bru ni yod la nor ni myed do// 
29b6(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la nor ni yod la 'bru ni byed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ji lta bu bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa nas dang / 
29b7(mdo): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / bzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nor dang byed 'bru yang myed do// tshangs rim pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og
29b8(mdo): byin byi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam bu gling ki myi rnams la pa 'am/ ma'am bu po 'am/ ngo bo 'am/ bran nom/ nor 'am/ 'bra la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ 
30a1(mdo): shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ban glang spyod pa rnams yod do// byang kyi sgra myi snyan gyi myi rnams ni tshol yang mngon par zhen pa myed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ni 'bru la gtogs/ 
30a2(mdo): pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum brgya ma gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / 
30a3(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ros kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa myed do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa 'dud na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs
30a4(mdo): pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / chad myed 'od dpa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge' chung pa rnams dang / tshad myed dge' ba rnams dang / dge' rgyas pa rnams dang
30a5(mdo): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / phyi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / bya nom snang ba na sa dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og myin gyisgra rnas kyang
30a6(mdo): de bzhin no// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshigs lnga pa'o// sdopa ni/ zla ma chan 'khrig dang khu hu~M da/ che dang nag po chu klung brag/ sa la dzing dang glang po dang / srungs ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam/ ji ltar 'jam/ 
30a7(mdo): bu gling gi myi rnams la/ bud myed zla mtshan can dang / sbrum pa dang / pU btsa ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnapas dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang byi zla myi snyan pa rnams la yang
30a8(mdo): yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dam bu gling ki phyi rnams kyi khye'u mo so lnga lon pa'i tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am bang par sems can nus te skye bar 'byung bar 'gyur de/ 
30b1(mdo): de la lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am lu mo snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du/ 'ad na bdag cag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du sems so// sum bcu rtsa
30b2(mdo): gsum pa rnams kyi ni/ lo drug lon pa de tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi na lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// dka' ldan pa rnams kyi na lo brkyang lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul
30b3(mdo): dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni/ 'jam bu gling gi myi rnams kyi khye'u dang bu mo lo bcu lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am
30b4(mdo): lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am pang par rngas te skye ba'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu'am bu mo snyam du sems so// khye'u
30b5(mdo): dpabu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di bdag cag ki ma 'am pa'o snya mra da sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nyid nas yan lag dang nying las thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing 'chi ba na
30b6(mdo): yang de kho na bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta bu bzhin du/ 'og byin gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// gzugs myed pa rnams ni lus kyi gzugs myed do// de nas ni de dag skye bar yang myi mngo // 
30b7(mdo): 'chi ba yang myi mngon no// ji ltar 'jam bu kr-ing gi myi rnams mya tshangs par spyod pa'i 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pa ni/ gnyis kyi gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / 
30b8(mdo): nub kyi ban blang spyod pa rnams dang / byang kyi sgra myi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams 'khrud pa tsam gyis
31a1(mdo): gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni bkod pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa/ 
31a2(mdo): rnams kyi ni bltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshangs rim pa rnams ni 'dod chags byed do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og byin gyi bar drag kyang de bzhin do// 
31a3(mdo): de ltar 'jab bu gling ki myi rnams la zhu chu myi rtsad pa yod pa 'byung ba bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi phan lang spyod pa rnams dang / byad kyi skra myi snyan pa rnams
31a4(mdo): la yang de bzhin no// rgyal chen bzhi'o lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'o ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab
31a5(mdo): 'bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phral dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la 'dod chags myed do/ 
31a6(mdo): tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og myin gi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'cha ba ni yod
31a7(mdo): do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rab ni bskal pa gcig ste/ par ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// myi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum bcu gar yin pa de nau yi dgas rnams kyi nyin
31a8(mdo): zhag ka cig ste/ nyin zhag sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yid dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba yod do// mya'i ltar brtson lo
31b1(mdo): khri lnga stod yod do// shar kyi lus 'phags kyi phyi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo nya sa brgya lnga bcu ste bang ba dong 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi phyi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni
31b2(mdo): lnga brgya ste bar ma dor 'chi ba yod do// byang gi sgra myi snyan kyi myi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni myed do// ci'i phyir byad kyi sgra myi snyan kyi myi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba
31b3(mdo): myed ce na/ de dag la bdag ki ba byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa byed de/ che nges shing khyad par du 'gro bas/ de'i phyir byang gi spra myi snyadan kyi byirnams la bar ma dong 'chi ba byed do// 'jam bu gling
31b4(mdo): ki myi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa yod do// 'jam bya gling gi byi rnams res 'ag ni che dpag tu myed par 'gyur// res 'ag ni che lo brgya bar 'gyur ro// byi rnams
31b5(mdo): kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha nas kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyan zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcigazla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha
31b6(mdo): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo lnga brgya ste bar ma do 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi ltar bzhin lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do// de'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyi zhag gcig go/ 
31b7(mdo): nyin zhag sum bany+tsa la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi sems can rnams kye che'i tshad kyi ra ba ni/ sems can dmyal ba ba'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor
31b8(mdo): 'chi ba yod do// de myi'i ltar brtsen/ lo bye ba phrag 'bum phrag khri tos stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo brgya pa gang yin pa de ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ 
32a1(mdo): nyin zhag de sum bats+ya la zla ba gcig/ zla pa bran+du gnyis la lo gcig sde/ sam prar+b+ha rtsa gas ma gyi lU rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyai ra ba ni lA'i lo sngod swe/ ba ra ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ 
32a2(mdo): de myo'i ltar brtsi na lo bye pa phrag gsum dang / sa ya prag drag yod do// de ni sems can dmyal pa chen po thog nag gi nyire zhag kacig go// nyan zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig ko/ 
32a3(mdo): zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal pa chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i lo stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i ltar brtsi na lo bye ba
32a4(mdo): brag 'brum phrag bcu gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu khri drag/ stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo nyas brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab pra la gi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu
32a5(mdo): la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thabral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo nyas stongaste/ bar ma dong 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi ltar brtsin lo
32a6(mdo): bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang sa ya phrag bzhi yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig ko// nyi ma zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig/ 
32a7(mdo): ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni// sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mye'i ltar brtsin
32a8(mdo): yo bye ba phrag gcig dang / bye ba phrag sum 'bum dang / bye ba phrag drug khri brgyad stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni dgal ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyon zhag gcig go// 
32b1(mdo): nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ dga' ldan gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i lhar
32b2(mdo): brtsin/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dra 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de su 'a bram la zla ba gcig/ zla ba
32b3(mdo): gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can dmyal ba'i tshe'i chad kyi rab ni/ lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dong 'chi ba ni yod do// de phyi'i ltar bcin/ so bye ba brag
32b4(mdo): bye ba brkyang dang / lo bye ba phrag sa ya gnyis dang / bye ba pra/ ka dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// myi rnams kyi la brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyi
32b5(mdo): nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la yo gcig ste/ 'phral dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo brgyad lhod ste bar der 'chi ba ni
32b6(mdo): yod do// de mya'i ltar brtson/ lo bye ba phrag gnyi sa brgya sum bcu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyon 'ag gcig go// nyin dag de sum
32b7(mdo): la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i ltar 'byin// 
32b8(mdo): lo bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa drug dang bye ba phrag se ya gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'dam lnga khri nyis stong yod do// myi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha nas
33a1(mdo): kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo khri
33a2(mdo): drug stong sta/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de myi'i lhar bathi na/ lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag
33a3(mdo): gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla nga ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba che na po che ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i
33a4(mdo): tshad kyi rab ni khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do de myi'i ltar brtsin/ lo bye ba phrag bye ba lnga brgya dang / lo bye ba phrag bye ba sum ban+du dang / lo bye ba phrag sa ya brgyad dang / 
33a5(mdo): bzhi 'bum dang / lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// bar sdom ni/ dku dang gsum dang bcu bzhi lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / nyes brgya dgu brgya rnams ni/ myi'i grangs kyis lha cher bshad/ de bzhin gcig
33a6(mdo): dang bcu gnyis dang / gcig dang brgyad dang drug bcu dang / lnga brgya dag ni sems can dmyal 'i cher bshad/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskul pa byed de/ par ma do 'chi ba ni yod do// 
33a7(mdo): sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu cha'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa phyed de/ par ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa bcu ste/ bar
33a8(mdo): ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni
33b1(mdo): bskal pa phyed dang gnyis ste/ bar ma dor 'chi bani yod do// 'od chung kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gnyis ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rang byed 'od kyi lharnams kyi tshe'i chad
33b2(mdo): kyi rab ni/ bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dang 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa brgyad ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dkye' chung kyi lha rnams kyi
33b3(mdo): 'i chad kyi rab ni/ bstsal pa bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad myed dgel ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis ste/ bar mo dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 
33b4(mdo): dge' rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sprin myed byi lha rnams kyi tshe'i chad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ 
33b5(mdo): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// bsod nams skyes kyi lha na mas kyi tshe'i ched kyi rab ni/ bskal pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste bar pa dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi
33b6(mdo): che'i tshad kyi rab ni/ bskal pa lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dong 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes myed pa'i sems can lha rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// byi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ @
33b7(mdo): pa stong ste/ bar ma dong 'chi ba ni yod do// myi gdung sI lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ skal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dong 'chi ba ni yod do// bya rom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab
33b8(mdo): ni/ bskal pa bzhi stong ste/ par ma dor 'chi ba zhi yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ skal pa brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'og myan byi lha rnams
34a1(mdo): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma ngo
34a2(mdo): 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma der 'chi ba ni yod do// ci yang myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab
34a3(mdo): ni/ bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma der 'chi ba ni yod do// 
34a4(mdo): 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod de/ rin pa/ po gsum po de dag byang phyogs kyi ri nag po gzhan ka sum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs
34a5(mdo): na yang ri nam po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gi sum po de dag gi kyang phyogs/ ri'i rgyal po gang shes bya bayod do// r-i'i rgyal po garas kyi byang phyogs na/ r-i'i rgyal
34a6(mdo): po spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldan nas dpag chad bcu'i chu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba yod do// ma dros pa zhes bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la chur
34a7(mdo): dpag tshad lnga ban+ta/ zheng du yang dpag chad lnga bcu yod do// 'khor yug ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do// dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / chu sbrang rtse lta bur kang la
34a8(mdo): med tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos kun tu khyebs par 'dug go// de'i nang na klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang pa dang / sin 'du dang / sin ta dang / bag shu dang / 
34b1(mdo): 'di ltar 'bab po// gang ga ni shar phyogs nas klang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas klar lha brgya dang lhan cig du shar phyogs kyi rkye
34b2(mdo): mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sin 'dra ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ 'di ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig du lho phyogs
34b3(mdo): kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// bag shu ni rub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig ru nub phyogs kyi
34b4(mdo): rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si to na byang phyogs nas seng ke'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig du
34b5(mdo): byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// ji skad du byang phyogs kha kur 'gyur ba 'am/ chu mtsho yod de gzhan yang / ni/ de ni mtsho chen chu zhes bya/ za dang rgyun rnams 'byung kanas
34b6(mdo): yod/ chu klung gang ka sin d+hu bag shu dang / si ta dpa' rlabs dbu ba'i 'breng ba can/ chus gang khyad par 'phags pa bzhi 'bab ste/ phyogs bzhi dag tu kun tu rnam par 'bab / kang
34b7(mdo): shar phyogs rgya mchod 'gro ba ste/ sene d+hu lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba yin/ pag shu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro'o// de'i byang phyogs rgya mtshor si ta 'gro'o// chu klu brgya rab mchog bzhi po
34b8(mdo): 'di dag ni/ mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste/ re re zhing yang lnga brgya khyer nas ni/ chu'i rgyud rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro// zhes kyang 'byung ba lta bu'o// ri spos kyi red ldang de'i byang phyogs
35a1(mdo): dpag tshad nyi shu na gser gyi phrag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ro shese bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ 'khor yug du dpag tshad nyis brgya 'phang du dpag chad
35a2(mdo): phyed dang bzhi yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal med/ can dan gi chus
35a3(mdo): chag chag btab pa ste/ der yid tu 'ongab/ shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung pa dag ljang na/ de myi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung ga mthus phyi rol du 'thor ro// de'i kho khor yu ga haM gser gi brag
35a4(mdo): bya skyibs brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shi / pa g+ha na sngag la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nang gi sa bzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing lha na s+yA ga
35a5(mdo): la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ de dag du yid du myi 'ong ba'i gseg ma 'am/ gyo mo gang mi yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de myi ma yin pa
35a6(mdo): nas rlung gyi mthus phye ro lad du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na stug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gi chus
35a7(mdo): chag chag btab pa yod de/ der yang yid du myi 'ong ba shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de myi ba yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i
35a8(mdo): byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun shing sa la'i rgyal po chen po rab brtan zhes bya ba'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba yod de sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bcu bzhi thur du zug go// sa la'i 'breng
35b1(mdo): ba dang po'i la ni rtsa ba ni 'dom bcu gsum thur+ra dA zug go// gnyis pa'i ni bcu gnyis so// gsum pa ni bcu gcig ko'o// bzhi pa ni bcu'o// lnga pa ni dgu'o// drug pa ni brgyad do// sa la'i 'bres
35b2(mdo): ba brnyan pa'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bdun zur du zug go// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i yal ka dang lo ma dang / yal ga rnams gang yin pa de ni sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go// sa la'i 'phreng ba dang
35b3(mdo): po'i yal ka dang lo ma gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa la'o// gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o// gsum pa dang yin pa de ni bzhi pa la'o// bzhi pa gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa gang yin pa
35b4(mdo): de na drug pa la'o// drug pa gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// sa la'i 'phreng ba bdud pa'i yal ka dang lo ma dang / yal ka gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de dag nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs
35b5(mdo): legs shing blta na stug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing can dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/ der yang yid du myi 'od/ ba shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba deg lhung na/ de byi
35b6(mdo): ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gyi mthus phyi rol du 'dong ngo ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng tu dpag chad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lha na sUg la pa nges pa ste/ der yang / 
35b7(mdo): yid du myi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseb ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dge lhang na de myi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gyi mthus phyi rol du 'dod ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na rdzing dal gyis
35b8(mdo): 'brab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod pa dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ung / 
36a1(mdo): kha la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos khyebs pa yod de/ rdzing dal gyis 'bab kyi nang gi pad ma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lha ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo// pad ma'i
36a2(mdo): sdod pU rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ka shol mda' tsam mo// pad ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i pang lo tsam mo// pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog
36a3(mdo): tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes pa chen po'i R+Ya tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog du mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ s+thang ki s+tha rtse ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma zag go// rdzi ral gyis 'bab kyi kho/ 
36a4(mdo): ra khor yug ni rding bu brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad/ kyang dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / sbrar ci lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad pa'i lo ma rnams
36a5(mdo): kyang che zhing mchog du che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yog tsam mo/ pad ma'i sdong pu rnams che zhing mchog du che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzho ya mda' tsam mo// pad ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog du che
36a6(mdo): ste/ 'di lha ste/ shing rta'i phang lo tsam mo// pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog du yang che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po rA tsam mo// ro mngang zhing mchog du mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ spra bu'i s+tha rtsi ma
36a7(mdo): bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go// di'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha con du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na stug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal
36a8(mdo): cid can dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ der yid du myi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lgang na de myi ma yin pa rnams kyi rAng gyi mazhes phyi rol du 'dor ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum
36b1(mdo): pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa rab brtan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lha na sdug la mdzes pa yod pa de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la yan lag bdun
36b2(mdo): shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i 'go bo yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhi dbus srog chags lham bu chu gser gyi mdog ltar mar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab
36b3(mdo): brtang gi srid du dpag chad byed dang gsum zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'bang du dpal tshad phyed dang gnyis/ 'khor yug du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che brkyang stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang
36b4(mdo): gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta/ mdog ltar thal kar d+ha 'dug cing yan lag bdun shi ned tu legs/ par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi 'go bo yang dbyibs legs shing lhan
36b5(mdo): sdug la maM dzes pa ste/ sngo zhing dbus srog chags lham pU chu gsher gi mdog ltar dmar la mche pa drug yod pa sha stag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan de khor dang bcas pa dkun zla ba
36b6(mdo): bzhi ni/ breg bya sbrebs lha ma yin gi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug go// dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gi nang na gnas shing 'dug go// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan brag bya skabs
36b7(mdo): lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir prak+ka bya skye sa brgyad stong
36b8(mdo): dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang che'i rgyal po rab brtan breg bya skabs lha ma yid gi na pa nas/ shing sa lo'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi drung du 'gro ba na/ res 'ag ni tha mal ba'i chul rgyas
37a1(mdo): 'gro'o// res 'gra ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i rdzu 'phral che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar
37a2(mdo): grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi 'gro bo 'am/ bya la khar zhon te sil stan dang pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan shing sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi drung na gnas
37a3(mdo): shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni/ glang po che bstong po de dag kyang 'di la ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan srung ba dang / spa ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir shing sa la 'phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na nang
37a4(mdo): du ltas shing 'khod de/ shi sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lhas te 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du blta'o// gsum pI
37a5(mdo): nangar 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// bzhi pa'i nang dgang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// lnga pa'i nang na gang dag 'a da pa de dag kyang nang du yA'o// drug pa'i rang dkang dag 'khang pa de dag/ 
37a6(mdo): kyang dang du lba'o// bdun pa'i napar gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'i ste 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che rgyal po'i rab brtan shing sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan nas jing dal gyis 'gro ba na/ res 'ag ni tha
37a7(mdo): mal ba'i tshul gyis 'gro'o// res 'ag ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdza 'bral che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas glang po che de dag thams kyi nang na dbang che bar grags
37a8(mdo): pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ byal khar zhon te sil snyan dang pheg rdog pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po chen po rab brtan rdzing dal gyis 'ba'on pa'i nang du zhugs nas
37b1(mdo): zhing dgal la dga' mthur spyod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che bskyed stong po de dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che rab brtan de srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing dal gyis 'bab kyi mtha' kho ra khor yug
37b2(mdo): nas bskor te/ nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan rdzi dal gyis 'bab byi nang na che dga' mgur spyod nas phyir 'byung ba de'i tshe/ de'i dang na glang po che dbang che bar grags pa
37b3(mdo): gang yin pa rdzing ral gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas pad ma'i za ba rnams blangs te/ shin tu bkres shing rab tu bshal te/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan la 'bul lo// gang gi tshe glang po che'i
37b4(mdo): rgyal po rab brtan gyis zos shing 'thungs te/ 'brangs par gyu rad pa de'i tshe glang po chegazhan brgyad stong po de dag kyang rdzing bu brgyad stong dag gi nang du rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ 
37b5(mdo): rtsi zhing dga' le dga' mgur spyod do// pad ma'i rtsa ba dag/ blangs nas shi nad tu bkrus nas rab tu bshal te za'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po yul
37b6(mdo): 'dor spyod rab brtan gyi mthu ni de tsam mo// sems can thamapa cad ni srungs ma dang bcas shing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / speng pa dang / mya 'bral te sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing
37b7(mdo): bsod nams chub la bzi brjid chung la de dag ni rgya phrag shang po dang / stong phrag bang po gcig gis sru raM srung ste/ dper na/ ba yang ngas lug brgya phrag yang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis
37b8(mdo): srung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod napas chung la bzi' brjid de chung pa de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis srung ngo // sems can ga
38a1(mdo): dbang che bar grags shing bsod nams che sa gzi brjid che ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang ba'o// stor phrag bang po dag gi gcig bsrung ste/ dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ 
38a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ brgya phrag yang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig srung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar grags
38a3(mdo): shing bsod nams che la gzi'i brjid che ba de dag la/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig srung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ ji ste sems can thams cad srung ba dang bcas shing srung ba dang
38a4(mdo): skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / byi bras na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba dag yod par 'gyur/ spras pa/ srungs pa mthu chung ba zhig yid mde dag zil gyis dag ma ran nas 'tshe ba dag yod do// srungs
38a5(mdo): pa bag myed cing bka myed pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag byed pa'i rgyu las kyang 'che ba dag yod do// srungs ma gnyis sdoms nas kyang / zil gyis mnan nas 'che bar byed do// myi
38a6(mdo): rnams chos ma yin pa spyod cing myi rigs pa spyod pa zhig yin na/ chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / myi rigs pa spyod pa de dag la yang 'che ba dag yod de/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis phyi rnams kyi
38a7(mdo): srungs pa 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo' dang / sum mdo' dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / men tog kyi 'phreng ba 'tshong pa'i gnas rnams dang / zong 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / 
38a8(mdo): btung ba 'tshod pa'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de zla ba phyed kyi ches brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis g.yog zho shas
38b1(mdo): 'tsho ba rnams lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo' dang / sum mdo' dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba
38b2(mdo): 'chor pa'i gnas nams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyal te/ gal te de gis sbyin par ma tshor na/ de dag
38b3(mdo): gnas mthon po la 'god do// gal te de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni/ de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams lam po che dang / 
38b4(mdo): srang dang / bzhi mdo' dang / sum mdo' dang / spos 'tshong ba'i dganas rnams dang / me tog gyi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshod bI
38b5(mdo): gnas noms dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas na su zhig 'du ces 'jig rten 'di thos// cad la nyal te gal te de dag gyis skyen par tsher na ni/ de dag
38b6(mdo): gnas mthon po la 'khod do// gal te de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni/ de dag gnas dma' ba la 'khod do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni/ rgyal po chen po de dag nyid lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi
38b7(mdo): mdo' dang / sum mdo' dang / spos 'tshong pa'i gnas rnams dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zor 'gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung pa 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu
38b8(mdo): myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas na su zhige 'dug ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gyis skyen par tshor na ni/ de dag gnas mthon po la 'dod do// 
39a1(mdo): kal te de dag gis skyen par ma chor na ni/ de dag gnas dpa' ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ dge' slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi
39a2(mdo): po dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ci myi dang myi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzind pa dang / phar 'dzin da pa dang / dge' spyod du 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi rtse ba
39a3(mdo): la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs par byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma la kha na ma to ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / s+thi de dag smin zhing bsod
39a4(mdo): nams byed pa dang / gso' spror la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug rnag mang ram zhes 'jig te nad 'di thams cad la nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi ches bcu bzhi la
39a5(mdo): ni rgyal po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci myi dang / myi ma yin pa/ 'jig rten nam pa 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzind pa dang / dge' spyod du 'dzi nad pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs kyi cho
39a6(mdo): bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa la byed pa dang / bsod nabs byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma to ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing
39a7(mdo): bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag par dam zhes/ 'jig rten 'dri thams cad la rtul lo// zla ba phyed kyi ches
39a8(mdo): lnga la ni rgyal po bzhi po de dag nyid ci myi dang phyi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'ji dad pa dang / bar 'dzind pa dang / dge' spyod du 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs kyi cho bo la ri mor byed pa dang // 
39b1(mdo): don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang
39b2(mdo): gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul lo// gal te myi dang myi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar myi
39b3(mdo): 'dzind pa dang / phar myi 'dzind pa dang / dge' spyod du myi 'ji nad pa dang / bram zer myi 'dzind pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don myi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa myi byed pa
39b4(mdo): dang / bsod napas myi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma to ba rnams kyis 'jigs par myi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dang / myi sbyin pa dang / bsod nams myi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar
39b5(mdo): myi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te myi 'dug pa dag yang na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams// sum bcu ca gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du 'dus shing khod pa'i nang / 
39b6(mdo): du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ myi dang phyi ba yin pa 'jig rten na mar bya 'dzind pa dang / par myi 'dzind pa dang / dge' spyod du myi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer myi 'dzi nad pa dang / 
39b7(mdo): rigs kyi che bo la ri mor myi byed pa dang / don myi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa myi byed pa dang / bsod napas myi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phye ma gnyis la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par myi lta ba
39b8(mdo): dang / sbyin pa dag myi sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag myi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar myi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te phyi 'dug pa dag mang po zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos
40a1(mdo): sus pa'i ldarnams yin mi ni khyim gyi bar gyur / yi pa nyid kyang phyi shog pa skyed de/ kye bgyu pa sa 'dis shA
40a2(mdo): bsed rnams kyi byed pa dang / 'di rang byi ba la larnam po pa rnams kyis 'jigs par byismra ba dang / sbyin pa das kyi sbyin zhing bsad napas phyi byed pa dang / gso grongs nye ba gyi gnas pa
40a3(mdo): lharnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyuras ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur ro// zhes thos so// gas po gyi dang phyi mo yin pa'i jig rted do
40a4(mdo): 'dzidapa pa dang / ma 'dzind pa dang / dge' slong du 'dzind pa dang / bram ze 'di dang pa dang / gas kyi mtsha la mo byed pa dang / dod byed pa dang / rkye sa bskyed pa dang / yod mi byed
40a5(mdo): na nga / sbyi sbyin nga du byud dang / sa byung khang klu
40a6(mdo): bad ma 'de/ byam pa can ma ma'i pa napas/ yus cu gyi gsum pa'i rnarnam sa sani 'dun ma tshom pa du 'dus zhing 'khod pa'i dang du mo nas sring du thog pa po da pa ma 'i
40b1(mdo): dang byi pa yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ par 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzind pa dang / dge' spong du 'dzinang po dang / rigs kyi tso bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / 
40b2(mdo): bsod nams byed pa dang / che 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sprin zhing bsod nams byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khris
40b3(mdo): yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni/ de dag las thos nas/ sum bcu ca gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rangs shing bkru bar gyurd nas/ yid rangs pa nyid kyang zlos
40b4(mdo): par byed do// kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar byi dang myi ma yo na ba'i 'jig rted na/ mar myi 'dzind pa dang / par myi 'dzind pa dang / dge' skyed du myi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / 
40b5(mdo): rigs kyi rtsa ba'o la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par
40b6(mdo): lha he dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod napas dag byed pa dang / gsol spyod la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba ni/ myi rnams kyi chos bzang ngo // 
40b7(mdo): rkyen du bab po// legs so// dga'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro// zhes zlos so// de nas
40b8(mdo): lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dka' la bde' zhing yid bde' ba skyes par rig nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dir ni zla phyed ches brkyang dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang
41a1(mdo): cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba phyed la 'di/ gso' spyod yan lag brgyad pa la/ shi nad tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir / nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ dge' slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gang 'di skad
41a2(mdo): sun 'dir zla byed ches brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul kyi ni zla byed la 'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brkyang ba la/ shi nad tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ 
41a3(mdo): zhes tshigs su bcad pa do ni nyes par smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par bstod pa yin gyi/ legs par bstod pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa
41a4(mdo): yin no// dge' slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po rgya sbyin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti muH/ dadang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / na pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 
41a5(mdo): ra dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug sngal ba dang / yid phy-i de ba dang / 'jug pa rnams las yongs su ma krol 'ding / sdug sngal las yos su ma grol lo// des ra smra'o// de lta bas na
41a6(mdo): des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brkyang dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga la/ cho 'phrul gi ni zla phyed la 'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brkyang pa la/ shind tu m+b+hanyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir/ ra ci 'dra ba de
41a7(mdo): bzhin 'gyur/ zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// nyes par smras pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par stod pa yin gyi legs par stod pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod par yin no// legs/ 
41a8(mdo): khar ni ma yin no// dge' spong dag dge' srong gang dgra' bcom pa yin zhing / zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang
41b1(mdo): dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir zla phyed ches brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ri zla ba byed la 'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ 
41b2(mdo): shi nad tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'di / ra ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur/ zhes tshigs u bcad pa 'di smras na/ legs par smra ba yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par bstod pa yin te/ 
41b3(mdo): nyes par stod pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa pa yin no// dge' slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge' slong dag 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral
41b4(mdo): ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / s+dza/ ga sngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba las yongs sa grol zhing
41b5(mdo): sdug sngal las yongs sa grol ba'o ngas smas ste/ de lta bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed ches brgyadadang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phral gyi ni zla phyed
41b6(mdo): la 'ang/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ shaM ned hu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'di re/ da ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur/ zhes tshigs sa bcad pa 'di smas na/ legs par smas pa yin te/ nyes par
41b7(mdo): smras pa ma yin no// legs par stod pa yin te/ nyes par stod pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu klong ka kho ra khor
41b8(mdo): ra 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam dpag tshad gcig tu gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus pus po nub tsam du yongs su khyab po// gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'jig rten du 'gyung
42a1(mdo): pa de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing myed par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lab yin no/ 
42a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge' slong dag sngor 'byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe zang po rin po che la
42a3(mdo): zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'dir bskor da te/ rgyal po'i pho brang khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge' slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po
42a4(mdo): che brtag par 'dod pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la dazhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa de nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i po brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba
42a5(mdo): byed do zhes gsungs so// spyi sngo ma ni/ ri dang skye ba'i gnas ngag dang / nam mkha' lding dang nye tshong dang / grang ba dag ni lnga parabyas/ dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin/ 'jig rtenang gang
42a6(mdo): pa las tshigs drug pa'o// sdom ni/ srungs ma lha'i grong khyer srang dang dam rgyal byed/ chos bzangs sgyu ma'i lam dpa'o babs dang skyed mos tshal/ sa gzhi dang ni yongs su rdo dang glang chen rnams/ lha ma
42a7(mdo): yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin/ lha'i grong khyer dang / lha ma yin gyi grong khyer kyi bar da/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i srungs ma rnam pa lnga bskod pa la/ 'di lta ste// chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams
42a8(mdo): dang / phred pa thogs kyi lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos kyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams so// / gar gi che lha ma yin rnams sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig du g.yun
42b1(mdo): 'byed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go gyon no// ko
42b2(mdo): chu rnam pa bzhi gyon pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon charnams las/ 'di lta ste/ 
42b3(mdo): ral gri dang / ma dung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams la nad to// mtshon cha rngam bzhi/ ral gri dang / ma dung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum
42b4(mdo): pa'i lha rngapas dang / 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin kyi grong khyer dra nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan ladag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta/ 
42b5(mdo): 'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyis go chu bgos teHgo cha rnam pa bzhi/ gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas
42b6(mdo): pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gyi dang / mdapa dang / 'phang marung dang / mda' gA zhu rnams blangs te/ su pa bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rngams dang 'byed pa'i phyir/ lha ma yin
42b7(mdo): kyi grong khyer nas 'byung ba de dag chu na gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs
42b8(mdo): dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rnga'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gyi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos nas/ ko cha nam po bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul la nyam smra pa dang / bye du bya las byas
43a1(mdo): shes las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon ma bzhi ral gyi dang / mdung dang / 'phangs rung dang / mda' gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams pa/ lhan cig g.yul 'byed do// deng gal
43a2(mdo): klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur na ni/ klu rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lnga pa yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ 
43a3(mdo): gal te lha ma yin rnapas rgyal te/ klu rnams 'pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par/ 
43a4(mdo): byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams gang na 'khod par rU zhing 'gro'o// de nas/ lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / 
43a5(mdo): chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gnyis gcig tu ba sdongs nas/ lha ma yin dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed der gal te skungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin 'pham dzas
43a6(mdo): pham na ni srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cipa 'pham par byas te/ zlog ci de rgyab stond par byas nas// ri'i rgyal po re rab kyi pang rim dang po nas bang rim gnyis pa 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnaMs
43a7(mdo): kang na 'khod par rna zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / la ga na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gsum po rnams gcig tu bsdongs nas lnga
43a8(mdo): ma yin rnams dang lhan gcig tu g.yul 'gyed do// de ltar gal te srungs ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ srungs ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par/ 
43b1(mdo): byas te/ zlog cing rgyab smond par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rgyal te/ srungs ma gsum po rnams 'pham na ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs
43b2(mdo): ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ ro'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams
43b3(mdo): gang na 'khod par rku zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams ka pan 'khod par rtsu zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyis
43b4(mdo): rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po/ rnams gcig du bsdongs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed do// der gal te srungs ma bzhi po rnams
43b5(mdo): rkyargyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ srungs ma bzhi po rnam sa kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog/ cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ lha mo yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro
43b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams pham na ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ 
43b7(mdo): bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ ro'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bar rim gsum pa nas/ bang rim bzhi pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gang na 'khod par rna zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po
43b8(mdo): rnams dang / rtag tu byos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'breng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yos go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / srungs pa lnga po rnams gcig tu 'thor / 
44a1(mdo): nas na yin rnams dang / lhan cig shug yul 'byed do// de dgas te srungs malnga po rnams rgyas te/ lha ma yin rnams pa ma ma'i sungs la lnga po rnams kyis wA ba yidan rnams thug/ 
44a2(mdo): cing pham par byas te/ bzlog pa rgyab stonod par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro zar 'gyur ro// gas te lha ma yin napas rgyas te/ srungs ma lnga po rnams pas ra ri/ sus brgya rtsags/ 
44a3(mdo): pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs pa lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ nga'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa ras steng gi bzhi sus
44a4(mdo): brgya sa gsum pa'i nya rnams gang 'khor par nu zhing 'o// de nas rgyas 'i ltu mas kyi dbang po dad gapar ba ded med skye byin das/ rnams kyi dbang po
44a5(mdo): byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka kar bdag cag sru ras pa lnga po rnams lha ma yin dmas kyis thub cing pam pa ra byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab sto nang par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal
44a6(mdo): po ri rab kyi steng gi bzhir nu ste/ mchis pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kye'u shi ka de ltar gang du sa la zab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis ltar mnyan
44a7(mdo): nas/ sum bcu \u0f7fgsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag / gang srungs pa lnga po rnams lha pa yin rnams kyis thub ci bam par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab spyon du par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po'i
44a8(mdo): rab kyi steng gi bzhir nus te 'ongs pa shes par gyi se shig/ grogs po dag de ltar kang ki dus 'bab pa soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan pa la
44b1(mdo): bsams so// de nas glang po re'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin byasam pa rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bsgrum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las
44b2(mdo): bsrubs pa bzhin du/ glang po ri'i rgyal po rab tu brtun pa/ 'das bu gling nas kyi snang bar gyur te/ sum brtsom gsum pa'i sku rnams kyi nang du sothor // song nas mgo sram brgyapa gnyis
44b3(mdo): brjon par sprus/ ligi re re sa ba rtse ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la jing bu bdud bdur/ jing bu re ru la pang pa bdun bdud/ pad la ro ri la sdong bu bdud bdun/ sdong bu re re la lnga'i bu mo bdud bdud/ 
44b4(mdo): 'i bu mo chis g.yog mo bdun bdud de gsog more sa mos snyad bdun bdud/ mngon par sbyar te/ 'gro bo dag pa sa cad kyi dpar khyad par du 'phags pa gang yid pa nis
44b5(mdo): dbang ze rgya byir don do// de las gzhad pa'i 'ga'o lhag ma rnams la ri/ nye dbang po sa bcu pa gnyis po rnams zhod ro// de las gzhan pa'i glang po chernams la ni/ de las gzhan pa'i
44b6(mdo): sum bcus gsum pa'i lhan mas zhen no// de ni dang su pa phyogs te/ dper na 'jig pa'i drung ngam/ 'chags pa'i rlung ste/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu po su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro zhes ga
44b7(mdo): byings 'jar snyam du sems pa byed do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtad sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer kyi lho phyogs kyi sa nas byung ste/ skyed mos chal chub 'gyur chal du phyin nas/ rdu na
44b8(mdo): rjod pas du thod pa de metang ste/ 'di lta ste/ A'adra lnga'i rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mdod par sprul te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang ldan cig tu lha'i 'dzidzi / 
45a1(mdo): yon tan lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur da te/ che zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ci tsam du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lnga rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur
45a2(mdo): tshal du rtsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyuran
45a3(mdo): nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang pol
45a4(mdo): tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chu nga gi tshogs rnams kyi go cha rnam bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa
45a5(mdo): dang / shal las byas pa bgos so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam
45a6(mdo): bzhi 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams grangs so// mtshon chan ma bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin
45a7(mdo): rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed de/ ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal he/ lha rnams 'pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas na sa ka shing rta byang phyogs
45a8(mdo): su lha'i grong khyer kar na bar phyi re log go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ltar lha ma yin 'od dag bdag
45b1(mdo): cag ki phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na yang / lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyi re log te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed do// gal te lan gnyis
45b2(mdo): su yang lha ma yin nams rgyal te/ lha rnapas 'pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'phab par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab stond par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong
45b3(mdo): khyer gangar bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin
45b4(mdo): du/ skyegs par byas nas/ lan gsum du gsul 'gyed na papa 'dod do// snyam du shes nas ldan pas phyir ldog skye// ma yin nams dang lhar cig tu g.yul 'byed do// gas te
45b5(mdo): ma yin 'du shig rgyas te/ lha rnams pas da di/ lha rma san mas kyis lhan mas grub cing 'bam par byas te/ bzlog rgyal stond par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug so/ 
45b6(mdo): lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de lha rnams la lha ma yin nams kyis myi tshugs kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin/ 
45b7(mdo): dngas kyis der myi ji bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na'o dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag
45b8(mdo): chag gis ri rer myi rje'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// gal te lha rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams 'pham ra ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yid nams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab
46a1(mdo): ston par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ deng lha ma yin rnams/ 
46a2(mdo): 'di snyam de sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag dag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'byed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste lha rnams dang
46a3(mdo): lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta
46a4(mdo): lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// na kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin napas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag
46a5(mdo): bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du ga yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed do// gal te lan
46a6(mdo): gsum du lha rnams 'ab shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'bam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha ma yid gi grong khyer du 'jug go// g+ha ma
46a7(mdo): yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad te/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis myi tshugs kyang 'jigs skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mya rje bzhin du lnga/ 
46a8(mdo): rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha rnams kyi grong khyer du 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis der myi rdzo'o snyam du myi 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das
46b1(mdo): kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge' slong dag sngon byung pa/ lha dang lha ma yan ga yul tu zhugs pa na/ lha ma yin rnams rgyal he/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma in rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te// bzlog/ 
46b2(mdo): cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta byeng phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin du phyir snyegs pa byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
46b3(mdo): ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'byed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu ga yul 'gyed do// / 
46b4(mdo): gal te lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lnga ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su
46b5(mdo): lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnam lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi/ 
46b6(mdo): bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'byed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang snyun cag tu g.yul 'gyed do// dge' slong dag de lha ma yin rnams 'ab shig rgyal
46b7(mdo): te/ lha rnams papa 'a ni/ lha ma yin nams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad te/ lha rnams
46b8(mdo): la lha ma yin rnams kyis myi tshugs kyang 'jig shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der myi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lce
47a1(mdo): grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der myi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge' slong dag
47a2(mdo): 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus na/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams 'bam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yid rnams thub cing 'bam par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab
47a3(mdo): stond par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gi grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du saM sa
47a4(mdo): te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa la sa na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du/ shes nas/ lha pa yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams kyang lhan
47a5(mdo): cig tu gsul 'byed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams lam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin nams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas
47a6(mdo): shing rta lho phyog su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer kang na ba der phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du stegs par byed na ni/ deng lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag
47a7(mdo): gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum tu g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes das lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'byed do// gal te lan gsum du lha rnams
47a8(mdo): shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'dug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyor du zhugs nas/ 
47b1(mdo): so rnams bcad te/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis myi tshugs kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis myi ji bzhin du/ lha rnams kya
47b2(mdo): 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der myi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// 
47b3(mdo): dge' slong dag 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyurd to// ji skad du gang che lha dang lha myin lhan cag tu/ gnyi ga 'dus shing gsul ni 'gyed pa na/ shing rta'i kanyi zla mtshungs pa myed lha'i shing rta pa'i mchog yin no// zhe
47b4(mdo): 'byung ba lta bu'o// re'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi bzhin/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba/ chung dpag tshad bcu gnyis stong lnga brgya/ rkyang dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor
47b5(mdo): du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la/ mdzes pa bzhi yod de/ gser gyi ra bas bskor te/ ra ba la 2 pang du ni dpag chad phyed dang gsum yod do// ra ba de la cog rnapa
47b6(mdo): pa bzhi la byas pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / rdul la sa byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa na mas so// rkyen du 'phang ba'i mda' ya ba dang / 'thur du 'phang pa'i
47b7(mdo): mda' yas dang / bsti khang napa pa bzhi yod de/ kasemasas byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du d+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing lhan
47b8(mdo): sdug la mdzes te/ bkra zhing shi ned du bkra ba tshon sna rgya rtsa gocag gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi ned tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gi mda' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag no ni ne pas shes
48a1(mdo): byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mu nub pa tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ rlung byi mthus me tog D+ha dmas ni 'dong / me tog gsar rnams ni legs par gres// 
48a2(mdo): te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang byas mthu stobs kyis lha'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnyid pa dag ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ shes 'byung / 
48a3(mdo): ba lta bu'o// lha'i grong khyer de na sgo dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod do// sgo re re la yang 'bang du dpag chad byed dang gsum/ zheng du ni dpag chad byed dang gnyis gnyis sod do// sgo re re re la yang skar ma'i gzug/ 
48a4(mdo): su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye tu r+ya las byas pa dang / la las byas pa rnams so// zla ba kham pa lta bur yongs su
48a5(mdo): sgrub pa dang / ba lang gi 'gro lta bu dang / me long nams kyang kaser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dUr+ya la sa byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ dbyis
48a6(mdo): legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa yod de/ sgo re rer yang sum bcu Na gsum pa'i lha rnams srung pa'i phyir dang bskyab pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya'i ba'i phyir srungs ma go cha bgos shing mtshon cha 'jo/ 
48a7(mdo): par thogs pa lnga brgya bkod do// sum bcu sa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng du dpag tshad gnyis yod pa dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug la mdzes pa
48a8(mdo): gser gyi bye ma ba la cing cad da kyai chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ srang de'i g.yas shi yas na/ rdzi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i ba su
48b1(mdo): rngam bzhis brdzings pa'i rdzing dag yod de/ rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / 
48b2(mdo): ke la las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rngam bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gse
48b3(mdo): gyi lan kan kyi rten ma dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa'i dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bye dur+ya ni shel las byas so// shel kyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa'i bye du r+ya las
48b4(mdo): byas te/ dbyibs lags shing lta na sdug la mdzes so// rdzing bu/ de dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu sbrang che lta bu gang ste/ me tog ud pa/ la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs/ 
48b5(mdo): te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar pa'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te/ rje de de dag gi nyen kor la/ me tog/ 
48b6(mdo): shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyebs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog 'phrang rgyud dam me toka 'phreng rgyud
48b7(mdo): kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba ze ku la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rda rgyan legs par bya ba bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod
48b8(mdo): dkur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byor to// de dag gi nyen kor na/ dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / dag ko// bzhag gos dag rnas
49a1(mdo): pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag ko// dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go
49a2(mdo): rgyad sna tshogs/ lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag du/ de lta bu de dgag
49a3(mdo): lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo cha spyad sna tshogs/ pi bad dang / gling bu dang / pi bar rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lho'i bu rnams
49a4(mdo): kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag tu/ de lta bu/ de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang tog rnams dang / 2
49a5(mdo): pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud myed kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing
49a6(mdo): lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg/ rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri'i tshogs legs par bskos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod de// da ra
49a7(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha na mas 'khor dang rba bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dka' bku ba spod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang
49a8(mdo): po rgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba/ chung dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu rgya re yang dpag chad nyis rgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod dbyibs legs shing lta na stug la mdzes
49b1(mdo): pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag chad phyed dang lngas byed du 'phags so// khang bzangs rngam par rgyal byed de'i ming rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
49b2(mdo): byas pa dang / bye dur+ya lus byas pa dang / she la yaswa byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam paMr rgyal byed de'i them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / 
49b3(mdo): bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyi ka ba rnam pa bzhi bcugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas
49b4(mdo): pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi ka ba'i ri ka rter dang / ka gzhu dang bre phul dang gdung rnams dngul las byas so// bye dur+ya ni shel las byas so// shel gyi ni ka rten dang / ka gzhu dang bre
49b5(mdo): yul dang gdung bye dur+ya las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par/ rgyal byed de'i bya ba rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod de/ 'di/ lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / byed
49b6(mdo): r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzang sra rnam par rgyal byed la phyam stobs dang / ldan pa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / 
49b7(mdo): dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la the sges rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser
