49b8(mdo): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pa gu rnam bzhis bamigs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngu
50a1(mdo): las byas pa das/ bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor da he/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten pa dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni
50a2(mdo): gser las byas so// bye du r+ya ni shes las byas so// shel gyi ni rten ma dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa'i bye dur+ya las byas so// bar sdom ni/ rmang rten them pa ka ba dang / phyam rten dang ni stobs ldan dang / 'khor sa dang
50a3(mdo): ni spang leb khang / pa phubs dang ni za ma yin/ khang bzangs rngam par rgyal byed la/ ba gam brgya yod de/ ba ga ma re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re re la yang gnas
50a4(mdo): khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdud bdun/ g.yog mo re re la/ yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod do// khar bzangs rnam par rgyal
50a5(mdo): byed kyi nang na/ rdzing bu byas pa yod de/ rdzing bu de la chung dpag chad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du yang dpag chad lnga bcu/ mapa' skor du ya pa dpag chad nyis brgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them
50a6(mdo): skus byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pa gu rnam bzhis brtsigs so// rdzi pabA/ 
50a7(mdo): de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis sngan ma bzhin te/ dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la/ mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu spang ci lta bur gang ste// mai
50a8(mdo): tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khebs la chun skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad 'byi nad pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad banyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i/ 
50b1(mdo): gzugs cad sang snan pa 'byind to// rdzing bu de'i nyer 'khor na me tog kyi zhing sngon dang / 'bras bu'i zhing sdod pa sna sogs yod bu rnams legs par skyes gling / dbyibs legs pa yongs su yub she
50b2(mdo): me tog thod bzhin du gyurd pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud ram me tog phreng rgyud kyi/ slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gre 'phreng ba the ku la brgyus pa dang / me tog byin rgyan legs par bya bzhin te/ skam las skyes
50b3(mdo): pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byend to// dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon pa
50b4(mdo): dang / ser po dang / dpar po dang / dkar po dag go// bzhag gosarnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag bsapas kyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag
50b5(mdo): rngam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rgyan sna tshogs dang / lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang pa dag 'byung ba'i shing ldan pa dag yod do// 
50b6(mdo): rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi bar dang / gling pu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha dang lho'i bu rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i seMs
50b7(mdo): bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong par 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sprang rdzi dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim
50b8(mdo): rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud myed kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lci ba'i bu mo mang pos bstend pa dang / bsil snyan dang / pheg rdob
51a1(mdo): pa dag gi sgra sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po rgya byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa che zhing
51a2(mdo): dga' la dka' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer kyi shar lho 'tshams na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs shes bya
51a3(mdo): ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad sum h+ya/ rgyang yang dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgul brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad bye dang bzhi 'phags so// lha'i 'dun sa chos
51a4(mdo): bzangs kyi gzhi dang / yang tog dang / dga' ba dang / spyi 'dunas kyi gdang dang / yang thog gi rtse gzhi dang / bya ma gzug das dang / phyam dbul po thams cad shel byas pa dang / 
51a5(mdo): byibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bzhis kun
51a6(mdo): nas bskor to// de la sgo dang sa phubs dang / g+ha na dang / yang tog gi tshe bzhi dang / lu na dang / phyam dgul po yod de/ bya ba rku bo re re la yang ka ba bcu drug gyis kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i
51a7(mdo): lar ni rim pa bdun yang do// de'i dbus na byi dur+ya las byas pa'i ka ba zur brgyad pa gsal zhing 'phar myed pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa ka ba bzhi yod de/ skra'i rtse po tsam gyis khang pa brtsem/ 
51a8(mdo): pa'i spyi 'dus kyi rten la myi reg go// de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po n+ya byin gyi gsir gyi khri bzang po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// rer sum bcu \u0f7f/ 
51b1(mdo): gsum pa'i ldan pas 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang phyi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam kha chon du dpag chad
51b2(mdo): bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de ros g.yas g.yon na/ me tog ki shing ljon pa dang / 
51b3(mdo): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog zod bzhin gyu rad pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng
51b4(mdo): rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba ze gu la ba rgyas pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid
51b5(mdo): du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i thugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag
51b6(mdo): kyang zabs dang / kha tson du dpag tshad gcig tsam yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / byed da r+ya las pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam bzhis brtsigs la/ chu bsil
51b7(mdo): zhing chu sgang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ti dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyad pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / 
51b8(mdo): skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin pa 'byi dad to// 'obs de dag na chu dka' dang / rgyu po kur dang / mu sna tshogs byas pa dag yod do// de nas sum
52a1(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing dga' la dka' bkur pyod ngo // 'obs de dag kyi nyen khor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs pa rnams legs
52a2(mdo): par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog zod bzhin du gyur na ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dang / me tog 'phreng rgyud gi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba ze gu la
52a3(mdo): brgyas pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ ska ma las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i gzugs
52a4(mdo): can rnams skad swAnd par 'byind te/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par che zhing / dag 'a la dga' bkur spod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras bu nyams
52a5(mdo): su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya
52a6(mdo): lnga bcu/ rgyang yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag chad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs la lha na sdug la mdzes pa gser gi dra bas kun nas bskor te ra ba'i 'bar da dpag tshad gcig/ 
52a7(mdo): yod la/ ra ba de la cog gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rngam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du 'phrang ba dang / zur du 'phang ba'i ma dag
52a8(mdo): yab dang / bsil khang rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs
52b1(mdo): shing lta na sdug la mdzes pA/ bkra' zhing shi nad tu bkra' ba tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra' ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi nad tu 'jam pa ni dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ma 'am/ ras bal gyi
52b2(mdo): 'da' ma bzhon te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mar pos pus mo nu ba tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ rlung ki mthus me tog rting
52b3(mdo): ma rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rten gis na/ shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnying pa rnams
52b4(mdo): ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs pa ra 'grems/ shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// skyed mos tshal shingarta sna tshogs can gyi nang na/ rdzing bu dpag tshad lnga bcu
52b5(mdo): kha tshon du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ maza' skor du dpag chad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu re yang gser las byas pa dang / dam las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel
52b6(mdo): las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhes brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na/ them sbas byas pa yod de/ them smras de dag kyang gsem las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas
52b7(mdo): pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pa mu rna pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i lan kar gser las byas dang / dngul las byas byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dan pa bzhis kun
52b8(mdo): ras bskor te/ chu ba sil ba dang / chu srang ci lta bus gang zhing / me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan
53a1(mdo): pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byind te/ rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras pa'i
53a2(mdo): shing ljon pa legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa dag yod do// me tog zor bzhin du gyurd pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud ram/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas
53a3(mdo): me tog gi 'phreng ba ze gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi na rgyan legs par bya ba bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang
53a4(mdo): 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byind to// dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa/ bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dpar po dang / dkar po
53a5(mdo): dag go// gzhan gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag pa sems kyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste
53a6(mdo): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dpar po dang / dkar po dag go// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyad dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo/ 
53a7(mdo): cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi bar dang / gling bu dang / pi bar rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dge yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa/ 
53a8(mdo): sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud ci rnam bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / spang chang gi bdung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnaMs dang / 
53b1(mdo): khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams su bud phyed kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bstend pa
53b2(mdo): dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
53b3(mdo): g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa che zhing dka' la dga' bkur spyod de/ bdag gi las ki 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha tshon du dpag chad byed dang gnyis pan dbyibs legs la/ 
53b4(mdo): lhur sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing can da gi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos ka las g.yon na/ me tog kyi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i zhing ljon pa sa rom/ 
53b5(mdo): sogs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa da ga yod de/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na/ 9 tog 'phreng chud dam/ me tog 'phredang rgyud kyi slob me ga khas
53b6(mdo): bas/ me tog gyi 'phreng ba be ku la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi na rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyer pa dang / 'dod dasu/ 
53b7(mdo): sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byinang to// dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa dag rngam pa bzhi ste/ sdon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon mo/ 
53b8(mdo): dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sdong po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dang
54a1(mdo): pi ba dang / gling bu dang / pi bang chung gsum pa dang / khar dza dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang
54a2(mdo): ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste
54a3(mdo): glang po che'i bu zhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams bzhon pa ji lta bu'i 'dod/ sems bskyed ma zag du/ de lta bu'i bzhon pa la
54a4(mdo): zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa sna tshogs can du dong nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi/ 'bras bu nyams su myong ro// ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal shing rta sA
54a5(mdo): tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing pu sna tshogs shes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa sna tshog sa dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu
54a6(mdo): sna tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la gang gi tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal/ shing rta sna tshogs can du che zhing dga' la dga' bkur spyod la/ rang
54a7(mdo): gi las gi 'bras bu ni nyams su myong ba de'i tshe/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sha nad du rtse zhing dga' la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi myong shing rta
54a8(mdo): sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos chal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag chad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi' bzang po sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyes brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis
54b1(mdo): brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lha ne snag la mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa
54b2(mdo): rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten pa dang / gnyanan dang / shar pa ni dngul las byas so// dngul ni gser las byas so// bye dur+ya ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / 
54b3(mdo): gnya nan dang / bye dur+ya las byas so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi'i dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa bkra' zhing shi nad du bkra' ba/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra' ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi nad du 'jam pa
54b4(mdo): ni dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg nu ni par ces byed la/ me tog pa zhar ba mang pos pus mo nub cab du
54b5(mdo): yongs su khyebs te/ de nas myi ma yin rnams kyis rlung gi ma thus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rna mas ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du lha rnams las kyi dbang
54b6(mdo): kyi rkyen gyis na/ sa gzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// de'i lam srid du dpag chad
54b7(mdo): nyi shu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lha na sngag la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing can dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na
54b8(mdo): me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ 
55a1(mdo): me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog kyi 'phreng ba ze gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rnga rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes
55a2(mdo): pa'i bye sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byind to// dpag bsamag shing ljon pa dang / sngon po
55a3(mdo): dang / ser po dang / dbang po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod dro// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dbang po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung
55a4(mdo): paba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs/ pi bar dang / gling bu dang pi bar rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang
55a5(mdo): sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi sna pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'ab lha'i
55a6(mdo): bu mo rnams ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag du/ de lta bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gzhon pa dang / rta'i gzhon
55a7(mdo): pa dang / shing rta'i gzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi gzhon pa dang yod de/ lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo rnams bzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag du de lta bu'i gzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te
55a8(mdo): de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du 'dor zhing ci bder gnas par mngon par dka' bar byed do// de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi
55b1(mdo): lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu skyed mos tshal grub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag chad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong la/ dbyibs leg
55b2(mdo): shing lta na sdug pa gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ dra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can na ji lta bu de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ 
55b3(mdo): ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mying chub 'gyur tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal thub 'gyur tshal na rdzing pu chub 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams
55b4(mdo): dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams chub par 'gyur ba dang / lU'i bu mo rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lU rnams skyed mos
55b5(mdo): tshal yub 'gyur tshal du dga' la dga' bkur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang lus kyang chub par 'gyur zhing / sems kyang rtsub par/ 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir
55b6(mdo): skyed mos tshal gyi mying thub 'gyur chal zhes bya'o// skyed mos chal rtsub 'gyur chal lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po thub 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag chad nyis brgya
55b7(mdo): lnga bcu/ rkyar yang dpag tshad ti se rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag chad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can ji lha ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod pa bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi dupe phyogs dpag tshad ti
55b8(mdo): shU na/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rkyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag chad stong yod la/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ 
56a1(mdo): ra ba'i phang du dpag chad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mying 'dres pa'i chal zhes/ 
56a2(mdo): bya zhe na/ smras pa'i skyed mos 'dres pa'i tshal na/ rdzing 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams
56a3(mdo): 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dres pa yod la/ gang ki tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos chal 'dres pa'i chal na/ rtse zhing dga' la dka' bkur spyod pa de'i tshe yang tshol bar
56a4(mdo): dres te/ shin tu che zhing dga' la dag bkur spyod de// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mying 'dres pa chal zhes bya'o// skyed myos chal
56a5(mdo): 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag chad nyi shu na/ su gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba yod do// chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rkyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu
56a6(mdo): mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad ti shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal
56a7(mdo): zhes bya ba yod de/ chung dpag chad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rkyang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag chad stong yod la/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig/ 
56a8(mdo): yod de// snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mying dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos chal dga' ba'i chal na/ 
56b1(mdo): rding bu dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dka' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang ki/ 
56b2(mdo): tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos chal dka' ba'i chal du rtse zhing dga' bkur spyod pa'i tshe/ yang kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' la dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga'
56b3(mdo): Sha dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi byed dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed pos tshal dga' bo'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa kan
56b4(mdo): bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis ba lnga bcu// rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dang nga ga chad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdugal mdzes
56b5(mdo): pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas bar brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi 'tshams na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi zhing yongs su sa
56b6(mdo): brtol zhes bya ba yod de/ yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga zur du zug go// 'phang du dpag chad brgya yod do// yal ka byir byas pa ni dpab chad lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'du sa brtol gyi
56b7(mdo): yal ga lnga yod do// yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu 'dud do// yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu dud do// yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag chad lnga bcu
56b8(mdo): dad do// yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs u dpag tshad lnga bcur dud do// yul ga steng ya ni dpag chad lnga bcur steng gyi nam mkha' la khyab par 'dag go// yongs 'du sa brdol gyi srid du dpag chad brgya lnga/ 
57a1(mdo): bcu yod do// spobs su yang dpag chad brgya lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skong du dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do// yongs su sa brtol gyi dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // ji phyogs ma
57a2(mdo): yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rad ldang ngo // dpas tshad brgya bcur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me/ lhan ne lha nges 'dug 'dug go// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi lam
57a3(mdo): ser pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di lo ma ser pa las na/ da ni ring po ma thogs par 'dab ma lhag par 'gyur snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
57a4(mdo): pas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pas na/ de'i tshe sum bcu
57a5(mdo): gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di 'ang ba ma lhags pa las na/ 'di ni ring po mya thogs par sbal myig 'thond par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dka' zhing rab tu
57a6(mdo): dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa ro'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol sA la myig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
57a7(mdo): rnams kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di sA la myig 'thon pa las na/ da ni ring po myi thogs par sprul myig 'bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam na kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod
57a8(mdo): ro// dge' slong dag/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i shing yongs su sa brtol sbal myig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di sAl myig bye ba las na// da ni ring po myi sa
57b1(mdo): par myi rtog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs su a brtol gyi me tog nyab 'bus
57b2(mdo): pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rngams kyis yongs su sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ni ring po myi thogs par me tog kha bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas/ 
57b3(mdo): de'i tshe gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs
57b4(mdo): su sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las ra/ daring po myo tshogs par me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro snyab ras/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus
57b5(mdo): kyang yod do// dge' slong dag/ sum bcu sa gsum pa'i lha nas/ kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs su sa brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas po
57b6(mdo): dri ji phyogs su ri dpag chang brkyang dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag rang lnga bcur dang ldar ngo // dpag chad brgyad bcung ni 'od dang kha dog du lam me/ ldan de wA re 'dug go// zhing yongs sus
57b7(mdo): brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon ta lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par gyu rad te/ rtse zhing da/ la da 'dur spyod de/ rang gyi
57b8(mdo): las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong // dge slong dag sub bcum gsum pa'i lha dmas kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo// zhes gsungs so// bar gyi sdom ni/ dang por lo ma sor ba dang
58a1(mdo): nas 'dab lhags swal myig mthong / sbal myag bye dang me tog 'bus/ me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas/ shing yongs su sa brtol gyi nang na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi a mo lin
58a2(mdo): lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag chad nyis brgya/ 'phang du dpag chad phyed dang drug dang / dpag chad phye dang bco brgyad cha cig yod de/ dbyibs
58a3(mdo): legs shing lha na sngag la/ mdzes pa bkra' zhing shi nad tu bkra' ba/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra' ba ste/ 'jam zhing shi nad tu 'dam pa ni/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'das
58a4(mdo): ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na nems shes byed/ rkang pa bya dza te ka na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man da ra bas pus mo nub tsam ru yongs su khyebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang lo
58a5(mdo): rgya byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po// sum btsu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lnga'i 'dod pa
58a6(mdo): yon tan lnga dag 'byor da cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga'o la dga' bkur spod do// rang gyi las kyi 'bras pu nyams sa myo 8/ ra ngo // ar mo lam lha pa'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor ug na
58a7(mdo): me tog gyi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'i tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing // dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste// me tog thod bzhin du gyur da pa ni/ dper na me tog
58a8(mdo): 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'breng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba ze gu la rgyas pa dang / me tog gyi rna rgyan legs par bya ba bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa/ 
58b1(mdo): dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skud mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byi nad to// de'i nyen kor na dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang rnam pa bzhi ste/ 
58b2(mdo): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dbar po dang / dkar po dag go// bzhig gis rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi/ 
58b3(mdo): ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ bi bang dang / sring bu dang / bi ba chud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung
58b4(mdo): ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs/ la sa rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan sdang ba dang / phyi sdang ba rnams 'byungaba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams
58b5(mdo): kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag tu de lta bu/ de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang ci dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog
58b6(mdo): rnams dang / khong pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang pa 'dus rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lha'i sa rnams dang / bsti kha rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / 
58b7(mdo): so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud ma rnams dang / bud myed kyi tshogs mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri skra chog
58b8(mdo): kyis legs par bskos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan te/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang / bcas pa che zhing dgal la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras
59a1(mdo): pu nyams su myong ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos chal du spyad pa sa srung gi bu zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yod de khe
59a2(mdo): zha tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo' bo dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog
59a3(mdo): ltar dbus par la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu srid du dpag chad byed dang gsum// zher du dpag chad gcig/ 'phang du dpag chad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag chad bdun
59a4(mdo): do// glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung ki bu'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong sred de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing lha na sdug la mdzes pra/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar tu 'dug cing yan
59a5(mdo): lag bdun shi nad tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo dbyibs legs shing lha na snag la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog/ chags lham bu chu gsher gi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche/ 
59a6(mdo): ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnoms skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung ki bus mgo sum ban+du ma gnyis mngon par sprul te/ 
59a7(mdo): mgo bo re re la mche ba drug druka/ mche ba re re la rdzing pu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bAdan bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la gzhog
59a8(mdo): mo bdun bdun/ g.yog me re re la sil snyad bdun bdun/ mngon par sprul te/ 'go bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha dpung po rgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhag mdzes
59b1(mdo): la ni nye dbang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// glang po che lhag ma rnams la sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shind tu mgyogs te/ dper na 'jig pa'i rlung ram/ 'chags pa'i rlung bzhi/ 
59b2(mdo): te/ de na lha pa sa/ lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bdun du 'gro bo zhe 'am/ byi nas 'jar snyam du sems la byed do// de nas mang po chas srung gi bus/ sum bcu sa gsum pa'i lha nas so sor theb
59b3(mdo): gyi sgo nas 'don to// maton nas so sor skyed mos chal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang nas/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag/ 
59b4(mdo): nyid mngon par sprul nas lha'i 'dod pa lnga dka 'byor da cing ldan pa ra 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dka' bkur spyod do// ji lta rgya byin lha'i dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid
59b5(mdo): kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gi dbang po thags bzangs ris lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang / phyag la dbang byed do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
59b6(mdo): kyi rgyal po lnga pho brang 'khor grong khyer blta na sdug pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po pho brang 'khor srong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji
59b7(mdo): lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags pa'adas ris kyi khang la zangs kyang bdabs pa can zhes bya'o// su pa bcu sa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dums chos pa'angs shes bya ba'i lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin nom/ 
59b8(mdo): kyi lha ma yin rnams kyi 'dun sa nor bzangs zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / phub 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i chal dang / dga'
60a1(mdo): pa'i cha la ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang 'di lta ste/ kun du dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dka' ba dang / dka' ba'i kun dag lang ba rnams yin no// sum bcu rtsa
60a2(mdo): gsum pa'i lha rngams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang / rngub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi pa yang kun tu dka' ma dang / 
60a3(mdo): rab tu dga' ma dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra pa ma rnams so// sum bcu tsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su tsing tra pa Ta la zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo lig
60a4(mdo): lta bu'i rdo yab ji lta ba bzhin du/ lA ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi klang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos chal du spyad pa sa srung ki bu ji lta ba de
60a5(mdo): bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos cha la du sprad pa yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs shes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal por g.yur ror
60a6(mdo): sprad pa rab brtan ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor sprad pa yang bzod par dka' zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin gi shugs shes bya ba
60a7(mdo): ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag 'gul zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin/ lha ma yin rnams kyi grong khyer yang
60a8(mdo): 'khor dang ldan pa yin no// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshigs bdun pa'o// 
60b1(mdo): sdom ni/ phye dang drug dang zar cig mtha'/ zung dang gang dang 'bri ba dang / rnyog pa dang ni sdu ba dang / phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du byed pa/ zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad
60b2(mdo): phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig gis 'jam bu gling 'dor te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpas chad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug du nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro/ 
60b3(mdo): ste byar phyogasu gro ba na/ dpag chad phye dang rlug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad kyi cha gcig gis rgya mchor por 'dor te/ 'jam bu gling dpag tshad phye dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad kyi cha gcig khyab par byed do// 
60b4(mdo): zla ba rlug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ nyin mo zang cig re re 'bri zhing mtshan la wa cig re re skye'o// zla ba dU dag du nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste khyar phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 
60b5(mdo): mtshan mo yas thang cig re re 'bri zhing nyin mo las thar cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro na 'jam bu gling gi mtha' myur du 'dor ro// zla ba drug nyi ma byar
60b6(mdo): phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'jam bu gling gi dbus ring zhig gis 'dir ro// ci'i phyir dkun mtshan mo rong la nyin mo thur zhe na/ smas pa/ zla ba drug nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyog su 'gro ba na/ 
60b7(mdo): 'dzam bu gling gi mtha' myur du 'dor bas/ de'i phyir na dgun mtshan mo rang la nyin mo phurango // ci'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar nyin mo rang la mtshan mo thung zhe na/ smas pa/ zla ba drug du nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ 
60b8(mdo): byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'jam bu gling gi dbus ring zhig gis 'dor bas/ de'i phyir dpyid dpang byar nyi ma ring la mtshan mo thung ngo // ci'i phyir dgun drang bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogasu 'gro/ 
60b9(mdo): ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag chad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba rnams rgya mtsho chen por bab pas/ gling rnams su grang bar gyur da te/ de'i phyir dgun grang ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid dpag yang dro
61a1(mdo): bar gyur de ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag chad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba'i rnams gling rnams su 'bab pas/ gling rnams su/ 
61a2(mdo): 'gro bar gyur da te/ de'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyang chul// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyir 'khom sa gyi ngos ches bcu drug man chad 'od bri zhing kha dog dang dkyim 'khor dag tu zheng bri zhe na/ smras pan nyi sa dang nye bar
61a3(mdo): 'gro ste/ nye bar 'gro ba de rang gyi dkyir 'khor las de'i grib ma slar 'bab ste/ des de'i dkyi 'khor khyebs shing de'i dkyir 'khor yog par gyur da te/ myi snang bas de'i phyir na/ zla ba'i dkyir 'khor mar
61a4(mdo): kyi ro tshes bcu drug phan cad 'od bri zhing / kha dog dang dkyir 'khor dang chu zheng 'bri'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyir 'khor mar gyi ro gnam stong la thams cad kyi thams cad du myi sa zhe na/ smas/ nyi ma
61a5(mdo): rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar 'gro ba de/ rang gyi dkyir 'khor las grib ma slar 'bab pas/ de'i rakyir 'khor khyebs shing des de'i dkyil / 
61a6(mdo): yog par gyur da te/ myi snang bas de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyir 'khor mar gyi ngo // gnam stong la thams cad kyi thams cad du myi snang ngo // ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyir 'khor yar gyi ro tshes gcig yan chad 'od skye
61a7(mdo): zhing / kha dog dang / dkyir 'khor dang / chu zheng skye zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang pi nye bar 'gro ste/ ti ma deng me nye bar 'gro bya de rAng gyi dkyir 'khor las grib ma chung rur 'gyur te/ grib ma chu rur gyu rad pas// dkyin
61a8(mdo): 'khor de'i phyogs gcig snang bar gyur to// de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyir 'khor yar gyi ngo ches gcig yan cod 'od skye zhing / kha dog dang / dkyir 'khor dang / chu zheng skye'o// ci'i phyir phra ba'i dkyir 'khor ches so// 
61b1(mdo): lba la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar myi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar myi 'gro bas/ de'i dkyir 'khor la grib pa
61b2(mdo): gang yin pas/ nyi ma'i de grib ma de dkyir 'khor slar log ste/ des de'i dkyir 'khor snang bar gyur pas/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyir 'khor yar gyi ngo ches bco lnga la rngam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs
61b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyir 'khor gyi dbus rnyog par yod la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa myed ce na/ smras pa/ gling gyi rkyen gyis de'i dbus rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i rkyen kyis mtha' rnam
61b4(mdo): bar dang zhing rnyog pa myed de/ gling rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ka yin pa des ni dbus rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa des ni mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa myed do// gzhan yang
61b5(mdo): zla ba'i dkyir 'khor de la kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos cha/ la rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnam sa yod pas de'i phyir/ yang zla ba'idakyir 'khor kyi dbus
61b6(mdo): rnyog pa yod la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa myed do// gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma 'char ba de'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags su ti ma bye'o// byad kyi sgra myi snyan na ni nub bo// nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi
61b7(mdo): gr-ing na ni nam phyed do// gang gi tshe 'jam bu gling du nyi ma byed par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags na ni nyi ma nub bo// byang gri sgra myi snyan na ni nam phyed do// rub kyi ban yang spyod kyi gling da ni nyi ma 'char ro// 
61b8(mdo): gang gi tshe 'dzam pu gling na nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe/ shar kyi lus 'phags na ni nam phyed do// byang gi sma myi snyan na ni ti ma 'char ro// nub kyi ban lang sprod kyi gling na ni ti ma bye'o// kang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i na nab/ 
62a1(mdo): khyed du gyur da pa de'i tshig gar kyi lus 'phags gri bad ni nyi ma 'amar ro// byang gi sra byi stan na ni nyi ma bye'o// rub kyi ban blang spyod kyi gling da ni nyi ma rub bo// ji ltar 'das bu zing thog par spos/ 
62a2(mdo): ta te bshad pa de bzhin du/ shar kyi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra myi stan dang / nub kyi ban grang spyod kyang thog par smos te/ thams brjod par bya'o// 'jam bu grong gi shar phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar gi
62a3(mdo): lus 'phags kyi lho phyogs so// byang kyi skra myi snyan kyi rub phyogs so// dub kyi ni ban blang spyod kyi ni byang phyogs so// 'jam bu gling gi lho phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni nub phyogs so// 
62a4(mdo): byang gi sgra myi snyan kyi ni byang phyogs so// nub kyi ban glang spyod kyi ni shar phyogs so// 'jam bu gr-ing gi nub phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar kyi lus 'phags kyi ni byang phyogs so// byang gi sgra myi snyan kyi ni shar
62a5(mdo): phyogs so// nub kyi phan khang spyod kyi ni lho phyogs so// 'jam bu gling gi byang phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar kyi lus 'phagasakyi ni shar phyogs so// khyad kyi sgra myi snyan gyi ni lho phyogs so// 
62a6(mdo): rub kyi ban lang sprod kyi ni nub phyogs te/ ji ltar 'dam bu gling thog mer smos te bshad pa de bzhin du/ byang gi sba myi snyan dang / nub kyi ban khang spyod dang / kar kyi lus 'phags kyang thog mar smos te/ 
62a7(mdo): brjod par bya'o// phyogs ni bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs so// gar phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod de/ smyo phyogs su 'duzhes
62a8(mdo): ba'i sems can dag kyang yod/ rub byo u su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// lho phyogs la lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems
62b1(mdo): can dag kyang yod/ shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// 
62b2(mdo): nub phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogs su 'asu
62b3(mdo): shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i
62b4(mdo): sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod de/ phyogs de dag de dag la da ltar tha/ snyad 'dogs so// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshogs brgyad
62b5(mdo): pa'o// 8// sdom ni/ zla ba nyi ma gnyi kyi chad/ skar ma rnams ni de ba zhin te/ zla drug nyi ma dro ba dang / gnod par byed pa pha mo na/ zla ba'i dkyir 'khor kyi tshad ci tsam yin zhe na/ smras pa
62b6(mdo): zla ba'i dkyir 'khor ni chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor da dpag tshad brgya lnga ban+d+ha/ rngams su dpag tshad phye dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha cig yod de
62b7(mdo): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa shel las grub pa ste/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor da to// ra ba de'i 'phang yang dpag chad byed yod la/ ra ba de la cog rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag
62b8(mdo): yod do// 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dag go// gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / 'thur du 'phang ba'i mdal
62b9(mdo): dang / bste khang rnam pa bzhi dag yod do// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bkra' zhing shi nang tu bkra' ba mtshon sna brgya che gcig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing zhin
63a1(mdo): tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ma 'apa / ras bal gyi 'da' ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na na nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni bar ces byed la/ me tog man da ra ba
63a2(mdo): dag gis pus mo nub pa tsam du khyebs te/ de na myi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du/ zla ba'i bsod
63a3(mdo): nams dbang gyi rkyen gyis na/ zla ba'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// zla ba'i dkyir 'khor
63a4(mdo): gyi nang na/ lam srang chung dpag tshad bcu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la ma dzes paka gser gyi bye ma b.ral cing can dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa
63a5(mdo): de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na rdzing byas dag yod de/ rdzing de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang ka shel las byas pa'i pha gu rma ma bzhis pa cigaso
63a6(mdo): rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhin yang de them kras byas pa dag yod de/ the ma skas de dag kyang gser las las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye du r+ya yas byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam
63a7(mdo): ba bzhis bamigs so// dzing de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bsgo rang te/ gser gi lan na
63a8(mdo): kyi rtend ma dang / gnya' nad dang / shar ba ni rdul las byas so// dmal kyi ni gsom las byas so// bye du d+yani shel las byas so// shel gyi ni rten pa dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa ni bye du r+ya las byas te/ 
63a9(mdo): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus kang ba ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs shing / chu na skyes pa'i bya sna tshom
63b1(mdo): skad snyan pa dang / skad srid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byind to// de dag gi nyen kor na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon
63b2(mdo): pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur da ma ni dper na/ me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas
63b3(mdo): me tog gi 'phreng ba ze bu kha brkus pa dang / me tog ki rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar rje
63b4(mdo): gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byind to// dpag paHma gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / seradapo dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// bzhag gos nam pa bzhi ste
63b5(mdo): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// dpa ga bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon kho dang / ser po dang / dbar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha spyang
63b6(mdo): sna tshogs pi bad dang / gling bu dang / bi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba
63b7(mdo): rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rngams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta ba de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / s+phar ci
63b8(mdo): dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim dmas dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ljad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bste
64a1(mdo): khang rnams dang / bud myed gi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bste nad pa dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis skra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa/ 
64a2(mdo): dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ldan pa dag yod de/ de lha'i bu zla ba khor dang / bcas pa che zhing dga' la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su byong ro// ti ba'i dkyi rgyang khor kyi chad rtsi
64a3(mdo): tsam zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma'i dkyir 'khor chur dpag tshad lnga bcu pa gcig/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ rngams su dpag chad byed dang drug/ dpa
64a4(mdo): tshad bco brgyad cha cig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ shel las grub pa ste/ gser gi ra bas kun nas bskord to// ra ba de'i 'phang yang dpag chad yod la/ ra ba de la tseka rnam pa
64a5(mdo): bzhi las byas pa dka yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las bya sa pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang shel las byas pa dag go// gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zung du
64a6(mdo): 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / bsti khang rnam pa bzhi dag yod ngo // de'i rkang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bkra' zhing shi nad tu bkra'/ mtshon sna brgya ya gcig gis bkra' ba ste// 
64a7(mdo): 'jam zhing shi nad tu 'jam pa ni dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dal ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed/ me tog man dar bdag gis pus
64a8(mdo): mo nub tsam du khyebs te/ de na myi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ nyi ma'i bsod nams dbang gi rkyen kyis
64b1(mdo): naka nyi ma'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnying ga dums ni 'dong bar byed/ me tog gsang pa rnams ni legs par 'grebs ga shes kyang bya'o// nyi ma'i dkying 'khor gyi nang na lam srang chu
64b2(mdo): dpag tshad lnga bcu pa gcig/ zher du dpag chad phye dang gnyis pa zhig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ya bdal cing can dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa de'i blo g.yas natshan
64b3(mdo): na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi
64b4(mdo): na yang them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhos brtsigs so// rdzing pu de
64b5(mdo): dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang bye dur+ya las byasad pa dang / shel las byas po'i lan ka/ na rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gi rten ma dang / 
64b6(mdo): gdung bu dang / gzungs gzer ni rdul las byas so// rdul gyi ni gser las byas so// bye dur+ya ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gdung bu dang / gzungs gzer gyi bye du r+ya las byas ste/ dbyis
64b7(mdo): legs shing ltar sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus kang ba ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs te/ tsu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs ska/ 
64b8(mdo): snyan cing 'debs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byind to// de dag kyi nyen kor na me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs
65a1(mdo): yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma
65a2(mdo): mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'breng ba ze gu la bcus pa dang / me tog gi rma rgyan legs par bya ba bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 
65a3(mdo): 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byind to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dpar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
65a4(mdo): dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs pi bang
65a5(mdo): dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / hab shing rna mas 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rka nga rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / myi snang ba 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de
65a6(mdo): lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma zag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / spang rtsi dang / spang chang gi btud ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog/ 
65a7(mdo): rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams bud myed kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mar
65a8(mdo): bos bstend pa dang / sil snyad dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra ska da pa spogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bzlas pa dang / baba' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i bu nyi ma 'khor pa/ 
65b1(mdo): bcas pa che zhing dka' la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las gi 'bras bu nyabs su myong ngo // skar ma'i gzugs rnams kyi tshad ci tsam zhe na/ spras pa/ skar ma'i gzugs rnams la thams cad kyi nang na che
65b2(mdo): ba gang yin pa de dag ni rkyang grags bco brgyad pa'o// thams cad kyi nang na chung ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyang grags gsum pa'o// phal cher ni rgyang grags bcu pa dang / bcu gnyis pa yod de/ dbyibs legs
65b3(mdo): shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa shel las grub pa ste/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor da te/ ra ba de la tshig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bye dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las
65b4(mdo): rnam pa bzhi dang / mda' yab dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnam pa bzhi yod do// de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon rgya rtsa gcig
65b5(mdo): gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shi nad tu 'jam pa ni dper na/ shi nga bal gi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par
65b6(mdo): ces byed la/ me tog mar da ra ba dag gis pus mo nub tsam du l+ye bas te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar ba rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams
65b7(mdo): bsod nams dbang gi rkyen kyis na/ gzhal myed khang mchog dag na rlung chen ldang / me tog/ rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ shes kyang bya'o// de dag gi na na
65b8(mdo): ring bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha su rnam bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs
66a1(mdo): bzhi na yang them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las bas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye du ra las bas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha ga rnam bzhis btsigs so// 
66a2(mdo): rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / rdul las byas pa dang / bye dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kan rngam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan kyi rten ma dang / gdung bu dang / 
66a3(mdo): gzungs gzer ni rdul las byas so// dngul gyi gser las byas so// bye dur+ya ni she l-i las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gdung bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bye dur+ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug
66a4(mdo): la mdzes pa chu bsil ba dang / chu sprang Ni lta bus gang pa ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ka mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongs su khyebs shing / chu/ nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing
66a5(mdo): mdzes pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byind to// de dag gi nyen 'khor me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs
66a6(mdo): yod pa rnam par skyes shing dbyibs legs la/ yongs su grub pa ste/ me tig 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyurd pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ 
66a7(mdo): tog gi 'phreng ba the gu brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ zar las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yaMd du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur
66a8(mdo): sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byind to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rngams yod de/ rgyas par snga ba bzhin no// de dag na gzhal med khang
66b1(mdo): na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rngams he zhing dka' la dga' bkur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu tams su myong ngo // nyi mas zla ba drug du bgrod pa gar yin pa re ni/ zla bas zla ba gcig tu 'gro ba dang
66b2(mdo): 'ong bar byed do// ci'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyir 'khor la ltas na dmyig la gnod par 'gyur la/ zla ba'i dkyir 'khor la ltas na ni gnod par mya 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba'i dkyir 'khor ni chu shel yang yin la
66b3(mdo): shel dad pa yang yin/ nyi ma'i dkyir 'khor ni me shel yang yin la/ de'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyir 'khor la bltas na ni myig la gnod par 'gyur la/ zla ba'i dkyir 'khor ni gnod par myi 'gyur ro// 'jig
66b4(mdo): rten bzhag pa las tshigs dgu pa'o// // sdom la/ 'byung rab chen por 'du shes dang / bdag du yang ni 'du shes pa/ ram mkha' la ni sar 'du shes/ dus ni gnyis su byas
66b5(mdo): pa dang / skad cig pa'i tha ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nau sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang rlung gi khams so// sems can sa la sar 'du shes pa dag
66b6(mdo): kyang yod/ chung 'du shes dag kyang yod/ mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yang / rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// sems can tshu la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang sod/ chur 'du shes pa ras kyang yod/ mer 'du
66b7(mdo): shes pa dag kyang yod/ rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// sems cad me la~M sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ chur 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ ser 'du shes pa dan kyang yod/ rlung du 'du shes pa dan
66b8(mdo): kyang yod do// sems can chung la mang 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ chung 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ ber 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yad do// sems can sa la bden tu
67a1(mdo): shes pa dag kyang yod de/ sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni bdag yin la/ bdag gang yin pa de ni ma yin te/ de ltar sa dang bdag dang gnyis su dbyer myed cing tha dad pa ma yin te/ bdag gi bdag
67a2(mdo): ni rdzogs pa yin na// zhes nas de dag sa la bkur bstir byed/ btsun par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// de dag gis bkur bstir byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas
67a3(mdo): dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te bkur bstir byed cire nye bar brten te/ gnas la sems kyis lung bstan pa ma yin no// sems can chu dang me dang / rlung la bdag du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod de/ rlung gang yin pa de/ 
67a4(mdo): ni bdag yin la/ bdag gang yin pa de ni rlung yin te/ de ltar rlung dang bdag gnyis su dbyer myed cing tha dad ma yin te/ bdag gi dag ni rdzogs pa yin no zhes nas/ de dag rlung la bkur bsti byed/ 
67a5(mdo): btsun par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// de dag gis bai ku/ ra bstir byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas/ dka' zhing bku la yid rangs te/ bkur bstir byed/ 
67a6(mdo): cing / nye bar brten te gnas la/ sems kyis lung bstand pa ma yin na// sems can sa la nam mkhar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ nam mkha' la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// sa la nam mkhar 'du
67a7(mdo): shes pa de lta bu zhe na/ til myed pa'i myi la la zhig gis/ khron pa rko ba'i myi 'ga' zhig la 'di skad du/ kye sdong po me reg ma dang 'dra ba'i myi brang mthong ngam zhes smras so// des smras pa ma mthong ngo // til
67a8(mdo): za 'am myi za smras pa/ myi za'o zhes// de ltar na sa la nam mkha'ar 'du shes pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' la sar 'du shes zhe na/ smras pa/ ji ltar bram ze la la zhig bor bu'i shing rtas song nas/ 
67b1(mdo): bor bu'i shing rta las babs te/ bong bu'i shing rta phur pu la btags nas/ phur bu nam mkha' la btab ste/ btsugs nas 'gro la bas bkris te/ sa la gan rkyal du nyal ba de bzhin du/ nam mkha' la sar 'du
67b2(mdo): shes pa yin no// lo gcig la dus gcig du mtshan mo ni yud tsam bco brkyang / nyin mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis pa de gang zhe na/ dkun zla za chungs yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la mtshan mo na yud tsam bco brgyad
67b3(mdo): nyin mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do// tshes dku phan chad ni mtshan mo ni bri/ nyin mo ni skyes te/ mtshan mo ni zar cig re res skye'o// lo gcig la dus gcig du nyin mo ni yud tsam brno brgyad/ mtshan rmo
67b4(mdo): ni yud tsam bcu gnyis pa yod de/ lo gcig la dus gcig du ti na mo ni yud tsam bco brgyad/ mtshan mo ni yud tsam prash+tsaganyis pa kang zhe na/ smras pa/ ston zla ra ba yar ki ro ches brgyad
67b5(mdo): nyin mau ni yud tsam bco brgyad/ mtshan ni yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do// tshes dgu phan chad ni nyon mo ni br-i/ mtshan mo ni skye ste/ nyin mo ni zang gcig re res skye'o// lo gcig la dus
67b6(mdo): gnyis su mtshan mo yang ud tsam bco lnga nyin mo yang yud tsam bco lnga pa yod de/ lo gcig la dus gnyis su mtshan mo yang yud tsam bcwo lnga/ nyin mo yang ud tsam bco lnga ba de gang zhe na/ smras pa/ 
67b7(mdo): dbyig zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dang / ston zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo chos brgyad la mtshan mo yang yud tsam bco lnga/ nyin mo yang yud tsam bco lnga yod do// chos bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skad gcig dang
67b8(mdo): de'i skad gcig dag yang cig dang / yud tsam rnams so// skad cig pargya nyi shu la ni de'i skad cig go// de'i skad cig drug bcu la ni yang cig ko// thang cig sum bcu sa ni yud tsam gcig go// nyid zhag gi sum
68a1(mdo): gcig ni yud tsam gcig go// yud tsam gyi sum cha kacig ni thang gcig go// zang cig gi drug bcu gcig ni de'i skad gcig go// de'i skad cig gis brgya nyi shu'i cha gcig ni skad gcig go// skad gtsi/ 
68a2(mdo): gi chad ci tsam zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bud myed bal 'khal ba'i 'bring gis ha cang myi ring myi thung bas bal rma la ba de tsam gyi yun ni skad cig gi chad yin no// de lta bu'i skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad gcig go// de'i skad
68a3(mdo): kaTIg de lta bu drug bcu la zang gcig go// zang ka cig de lta bu sum bcu la yud tsam gcig go// sud tsam de lta bu sum bcu la nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de lta bu sum bcu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu
68a4(mdo): gnyis la lo gcig go// 'jig rten bzhag pa las chags bcu pa/ 'o// // phreng bzhi ni yul mnyan du yod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ skal ba ni grangs byed pa bzhi ste grangs/ 
68a5(mdo): myed pa rag gis bskal par 'jig go// grangs myed pa dag gis bska la pa zhig par gnas so// grangs myed pa dag gis bskal pa chags so// grangs myed pa dag gis bskal ba chags par gnas/ 
68a6(mdo): so// zhes gsungs te bar ki skal pa brgyad cu la ni bskal pa chen po gcig ste/ bar gyi skal pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten 'jig go// bar gi skal pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten zhig par gnas so// khar gyi skal pa/ 
68a7(mdo): nyi nus ni 'jig rten bdugs so// bar gyi nas pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten 'jugs par gnas so// 'di/ pa rnam pa gsum ste// mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'dzis pa'o// 
68a8(mdo): 'jig pa gsum gyi pho mo ni 'od gsal ba dang dko'i rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams te/ gang ka tshe mes tshig pa 'byung ba/ de'i tshe 'od gsal gi lha rnam la 'jig pa'i rtse mo thug go// gang gi
68b1(mdo): chus 'jig pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ dge' rgyas kyi lha rnams la 'jig pa'i rtse mo thug go// gang gi tshe rlung gis 'jig pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams la 'jig pa'i the mo zug go// mes 'jig
68b2(mdo): pa lan bdun zhing chus 'jig pa lan gcig/ chus 'jig pa lan bdun zhing rlung gis 'jig pa lan gcig 'byung ngo // bar gi skal pa ni gsum ste/ mchod kyi bar gyi skal pa dang / nad kyi bar gyi skal pa dang / 
68b3(mdo): mu ki'i bar kye bskaldad pa ste/ bskal pa ni mchod dang / nad dang / mug ge gsum gyis mthar thug par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe mtshon gyi bang gi skal da pa 'ong du cha zhing 'byung du nye bar gyu rad pa de'i tshe byi
68b4(mdo): rnams kyi tshe lo bcu thub par gyu rad te/ che lo bcu pa'i phyi rnams kyi nung na/ kang yun ring du 'tsho ba des lo bcu thub ste/ dper na da ltar gyi napan gang sun ring du 'tsho zhing ci legs ci bdeng sa
68b5(mdo): klong byed pa des lo brgya 'am cung zad lhag par thub pa de bzhin du tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi nang na gang yun rang du'atsho ba des lo bcu thub bo// tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi bu ci
68b6(mdo): pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba la/ mas legs su smyon pa ra/ bad ki bu lo btsuSh+Ti bar du yun ring du 'gro bar gyur da cig ces legs su smon dbar byed de/ dper du da ltar gyi dri rnams kyi bu
68b7(mdo): ba cug cing yid du 'ong ba la/ mas legs su smin pa ra 'di skad du/ bdag gi bu lo brgya pa'i bar du yun ring du 'tshe bar gyu ra cig ces legs su smon par byed pa de bzhin du/ chel bcu po'i phyin
68b8(mdo): kyi TI ga pa sdug kyi yid du 'angab sa ma sems su smon pa 'di skad du/ bangag gi bu mo bcu po'i ming du yun ri tsho ba gyu cig ces migs bu 'on par byed do// ji lo brgyal
69a1(mdo): bu mo bcas nas/ zla ba lnga lon pa na khyim thab la gtong bar gyurd te/ dper na da ltar gyi myi rnams kyi bu mo lo bco lnga 'am/ bcu drug lon pa na khyim zab la gtong ba de bzhin du/ 
69a2(mdo): sngo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi bu mo btsas nas zla ba lnga lon pa na khyim zab la gtong bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi gros kyi nang na skra'i la ba mchog du gyur da te/ dper na da ltar gyi myi rnams
69a3(mdo): kyi gos ka shi ka'i res phran nam/ zar ma'i ras phran nam/ du gu la'i ras phran nam/ ko tam pa'i ras phran mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ che lo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi gos kyi nad na skra'i la ba mchog du
69a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i phyi rnams kyi kha zas kyi nang na ko dra ba mchog tu 'gyur da te/ dper na da ltar gyi myi rnams kyi zas kyi rang na 'bras su'i chan nag bag bsald pa/ tshod ma dang khu ba dang / 
69a5(mdo): bya na sna tshogs dang ldan pa mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa/ myi rnams kyi zas kyi nang na kod tra ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams kyi ro rnam pa lnga nub par
69a6(mdo): 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'o ma yang yor zho yang yong mod kyi/ mar mir 'byung ba dang / til yang yod til gyi phye ma yang yod mod kyi/ til mar myi 'byung ba dang / s+phar pu yang yod spang tshil
69a7(mdo): yang yod mod kyi/ sbrang rtsi myi 'byung ba dang / bu ram shing yang yod khu ba yang yod mod kyi/ bu ram du myi 'gyur ba dang / lan tsad ni tan myed par 'gyur ba'o// tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams mtshon chas rgyan
69a8(mdo): par 'gyur zhing mtshon chas bzhag par 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi myi rnams kyi rgyan makul kadu ba 'am/ gdu' bu rgyan can nam/ rna cha rngub kor rnams sa ma/ dpung rgyan rnams sam/ lag pa'i rgyan
69b1(mdo): rnams sa ma / rkang pa'i rgyan rnams sam/ sor thub kyi rgyan 'am/ gser rdul gyi 'phreng ba thogs pa bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i myi rnams mtshon chas brgyan cing mtshon chas bzhag go// tshe lo bcu pa'i phyi
69b2(mdo): rnams kyi nang na/ gang yang gyi 'dzid pa dang / bar gyi 'dzin pa dang / dge' sbyong du myi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer gyi ba'i nad pa de dag bkur ba dang / gces su bya ba dang rab tu bsngags par/ 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi byin pa
69b3(mdo): kyi nang nag gang ya gyi 'dzind pa dang / bar 'dzi nad pa dang / dge' sbyong du 'dind pa dang / bram zer 'di nad pa de dag bkur zhing gces su bya ba dang / rab tu bsngags pa che lo bcu pa'i phyi rnams kyi nangar/ kang yar myi 'dzi dad pa dang
69b4(mdo): par myi 'dzind pa dang / dge' sbyong du myi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer myi 'di/ pa de dag bkur zhing gces su bya ba dang rab tu bsngags parakur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i phyi rnams sems can gcig gis gcig mthong / 
69b5(mdo): na/ shas cher gnod pa bya ba'i sems dang / gsad pa'i sems nye bar gan sa par 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi myi ri dgas kyi rngon pas dgon pa'i ri dgas mthong nas/ shas cher gnod pa bya ba'i sems dang / 
69b6(mdo): gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du// che lo bcu pa'i byi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong rashas cher gnod pa bya ba'i sems dang / gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i phyi nas/ 
69b7(mdo): su zhag bdun du khyim phung bar byed pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag shing dang/ gseg ma 'am/ gyo mo 'ang rung ste/ kang dang kang la nom pa de dag thams cad mchod cha shi nad du no zhing 'debs par 'gyur de/ shin du
69b8(mdo): no zhing 'jebs pa de dang de dag gis/ gcig la gcig srog dang bral bar byed de/ nye du zad pa dang / longs spyod zad pa dang / nor zad par yang 'gyur ro// mtshon gyi bar gyi skald pa de yang zhag bdun kho nar zad de/ 
69b9(mdo): zhag bdun 'das nas mthar thug par brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe gang su yang rung ste/ 'chib de dag thams cad lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de na myi gang dag mchod kyis
70a1(mdo): bskal pa des 'dog cing 'dzem par gyur da la smod cing rnam par smod pa de dag las kha cig chu'i rdzing dang / ri'i rdzong dang / rno stug po dang / nags chal stug po dag du zhugs te der zhag bdun gyi bar du
70a2(mdo): ba dang / chus 'tsho zhing 'dug nas/ grong dang grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu phyir ldog ste/ sems can de dag gcig gis gcig mthong na shas cher byams pa dang / sdug pa dang / gus pa
70a3(mdo): dang / snying rtse ba'i sems nye bor gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di skad du kye ma kye sems can gson po mthong ngo // kye ma kyi sems can gson po mthong ngo zhes 'dzer te/ dper na da g+har ki myi rnams kyi me la bu cig bsdug
70a4(mdo): cing yid du 'ong ba zhig yod la/ zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te/ da na shas cher byams pa dang / sdug pa dang / gus pa dang / snying che banyi sems nye bar gnas te/ 'di skad du kye ma bu gson po mthong ngo // 
70a5(mdo): kye ma bu gson po mthong ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na/ shes cher byams pa dang / sdug pa dang gus pa dang / snying rtse ba'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ 
70a6(mdo): 'di skad du sems can gsor po mthong ngo // kye ma sems can gson po mthong ngo zhes 'dzer to// bar gyi sdom ni/ ring du gnas 'tsho ba dang bu mo dang / gos dang zas dang nub par 'gyur ba dang / rgyan rnams dang ni bkur
70a7(mdo): dang gnod pa dang / zhag bdun khyim du khyim phung byed pa 'byung / sems can de dag 'di snyam du mtshon chas srog gcod pa 'dis gcig la gcig rnam par gnod pa la zhugs pas nye du zad par gyur cing / longs spyod
70a8(mdo): zad pa dang / nor zad par gyurd kyis/ bdag cag gis dga' ba'i chos 'ag zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khor bar bya na bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du
70b1(mdo): sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni srog gcod pa yin gyis/ bdag cag kyis mtshon chas srog gcod pa spang bar bya'o// snyam nas de dag la mtshon chas srog gcod pa spong ngo // che lo bcu pa'i myi mtshon
70b2(mdo): chas srog gcod pa spong ba dag gi bu dang pu mo bcas pa rnams che lo nyi shu thub par gyur to// tshe lo nyi shu ba'i myi rnams 'di snyam du kye dge' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus che yang nur la
70b3(mdo): kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod pa dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang dag par dge' ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na/ bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos
70b4(mdo): gang zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// bdag 'di snyam du bdag ni ma byin par len pa yin gis/ bdag ga gis ma yin pa le nad pa spong bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag ma
70b5(mdo): byin par le nad pa spong ngo // tshe lo nyi shu ba'i myi ma yin par lend pa spong ba de dag gi bu dang pu mo btsas pa rnams tshe lo bzhi bcu thub par gyur da he/ de dag las kha cig ni che lo lnga bcu thub
70b6(mdo): par gyurd to// tshe lo lnga bcu pa'i myi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dga' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe yang nur la/ kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod 'phel bar snang gis
70b7(mdo): bdag cag gis yang dag par lhag par dge' ba'i chos 'ag zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na/ bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du semaso
70b8(mdo): de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yin gis/ bdag cag gis 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag 'dod pa la log par ga yem pa spong ngo // 
71a1(mdo): tshe lo lnga bcu pa'i myi 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba de dag gi bu dang bu mo btsas pa rnams che lo brgya thub par gyurang to// che lo brgya pa'i phyi rnams 'di snyam du kye dge' ba'i chos des
71a2(mdo): yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe yang nur la/ stobs dang / kha dog dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gyis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dga' ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag
71a3(mdo): par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na bdag cag gis dga' ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis/ bdag cag
71a4(mdo): gis rdzun du smra ba spang par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag rdzun du sma ba spong ngo // tshe lo brgya pa'i myi brdzun du smra ba spong ba de dag gi bu dang bu mo bcas pa rnams tshe lo nyes brgya thub par gyu rad te/ de dag
71a5(mdo): las kha cig ni che lo nyis brgya lnga bcu thub par gyurd to// tshe lo nyis brgya lnga bcu'i myi rnams 'od snyam du kye dge' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe yang nu ra la/ kha dog dang
71a6(mdo): stobs dang / bdel ba dang / longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge' ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par byas na/ bdag cag gis dgel ba'i chos yang dag
71a7(mdo): bar blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni phra ma can yin kyis bdag gis phra ma spang bar bya'o// snyam nas de dag phra ma spang ngo // che lo nyis brgya lnga bcu pa'i myi pra ya/ 
71a8(mdo): spong ba de dag gi bA dang bu mau btsas pa rnams/ tshe lo lnga brgya thub par gyu rad to// tshe lo lnga brgya pa'i myi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dge' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyas tshe yang nu ra la/ kha dog dang / 
71b1(mdo): stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge' ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par byar/ bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos ka
71b2(mdo): zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni rag rtsub po smra ba yid kyis/ bdag cag gis rag rtsub po spang bar bya'o// snyam nas de dag rtsub po spong ngo // che lo
71b3(mdo): lnga brgya pa'i myi ngag rtsub po spong ba de dag gi bu dang bu mo bcas pa rnams che lo stong thub par gyu rad to// che lo stong pa'i myi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dga' ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus che yang nur la/ 
71b4(mdo): kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag kyang 'phe la bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis snang lhag par dgel ba'i chos 'gra' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par byan bdag
71b5(mdo): cag gis dge'i ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni tshig kyal pa can yin gyis/ bdag cag gyis tshig kyal
71b6(mdo): pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag tshig kyal pa spong ngo // tshe lo stong pa'i myi tshig kyal pa spong ba de dag gi bu dang bu mo bcas pa rnams che lo nyis stong thub par gyur da te/ de dag la kha cig che lo nyis stong lnga
71b7(mdo): brgya bub par gyu ra to// che lo nyis stong lnga brgya pa'i phyi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dbe' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus/ tshe yang nur la/ kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag
71b8(mdo): kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag pa'i chos 'gal zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na/ bdag gis dgel ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam/ 
72a1(mdo): du sems so// de dag 'di snyam tu kye bdag cag ni ban gru sems can yin gis bdag cag gis kharna pa sems snang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag ban pa sems spang ngo // tshe lo nyas stong lnga brgya pa'i
72a2(mdo): phyi rnams brna pa sems spong de dag gis bu dang bu mo btsas pa de dag rnams tshe lo lnga stong thub par gyu rang to// tshe lo lnga stong pa'i myi rnams kyid kye dge bo'i chos yang dag par blangs khwa'i rgyus tshe yang nu pa la/ 
72a3(mdo): kha dog dang / stobs dang / bdel ba dang / long myong dag kyang 'phel ba bsdang gis/ bdag cag gis yang dag par dge' ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par byan// bdag cag kwi/ 
72a4(mdo): dgel ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya snyam du seMs so// de dag 'di snyam tu kye bdag cag ni gno// de/ sems can yin yis/ bdag cag ni gnod sos spa bar byan
72a5(mdo): snyam tu de dag gnod sems spong po// tshe lo lnga sto pa'i myi ga nodasems spa ba de dag gi bu dang bu mo btsas pa rnams che lo khri thub par gyur to// tshe lo khri pa'i myi rnams 'dri snyam dutu/ rkye
72a6(mdo): dgel ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus che yang nu pa la/ kha ro ka dang / stobs dang / bdel ba dang / long myod/ dag kya nga 'phel khar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dgal ba'i chos
72a7(mdo): 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya ba bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos ka zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam tu bdag cag ni log par lta
72a8(mdo): pa can yin gis/ bdag cag gis log par lta ba spo ba par bya'o snyam nas de dag log par lta ba spong ngo // tshe lo khri ba'i myi log par lta ba spong ba de dag ki bu dang / bu mo btsas pa rnams che lo nyi l+li
72b1(mdo): thub par gyur to// tshe lo nyi khri thub pa'i rnams 'di snyam du kyai dga' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe yang nur la/ kha dog dang / stobs dpa/ bde ba dang / longab skyod dag kyang 'phel ba
72b2(mdo): snang gis/ bdag cag gis ya ltag par dge' ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya na/ bdag cag gis dge' ba'i chos ga pa zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par bya sAM tu sem so// de dag
72b3(mdo): 'di snyam du kye bdag cag gi chos ma yin pa'i chags pas chags pa dang / byi rigs pa'i 'dod pas zil gyis gnon pa pa dang / long pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin zhes bdag cag gis chos 'di gsum u pa byar bya'o// 
72b4(mdo): zham nas/ de dag chos de gsum spong ngo // tshe lo na khri pa'i phyi chos gsu po 'di dge slong ba 'di dag bu dang bu mo bcas pa rnams tshe lo bzhi khri thub par gyurang to// che mo zan khro pa'i gyi rnams 'dis
72b5(mdo): du/ kye dge' ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus che yang nur la kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs pyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang dag par dge'
72b6(mdo): ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par lpang+yas te/ 'khod par bya na bdag cag gis dgel ba'i chos gang gis yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam tu sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag kyi chag/ mar myi 'chi
72b7(mdo): pa par gyi 'dzind pa/ dgel spyong du myi 'dzind pa/ bram zer gyi 'dzin pa pa/ rigs kyi tso bo la ri mo mya byed pa yin gyis/ bdag cag gis ma 'dzind pa dang ma 'dzind pa dang // dge la sbyong du 'dzin pa tha
72b8(mdo): dang bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs kyi cho lo la ri mor bya'o snyam nasaH/ de dag mar 'dzi nad par byed/ par 'dzind par byed/ dge' spyod tu 'dzind par byed/ bram ze 'dzin pa par byed/ rigs kyi cho so la 'i
73a1(mdo): mor byed do// lo ba'i bri ba'i phyi mar 'dzind pa dang / phar 'dzind pa dang / dgel sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa pa dang / rigs kyi jo bo la ri mor byed do// lo bzhi khri ba'i myisar
73a2(mdo): 'dzi nad pa dang / phar 'dzind pa dang / dgel skyong du 'dzi nad pa dang / bram zer 'dzind pa dang / rigs kyi khro bo la ri mo byed pa de dag gi bu dang bu mo btsas pa rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur pa to// tshe lo brgyad
